Automatic_Drawing.description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning.
Do not think — act.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow disintegrates from inactivity by -1.5 seconds.
Automatic_Drawing.name: Automatic Drawing

Charcoal_Stick.description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.
  • The Auras of flying Dire Crows are no longer visible.
  • The Auras of Dire Crows are visible for 0.5 seconds upon being summoned.
Charcoal_Stick.name: Charcoal Stick

Choclo_Corn.description:
A type of corn common in South America.
A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.
  • Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +2 seconds.
Choclo_Corn.name: Choclo Corn

Darkest_Ink.description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.
  • Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
    • This effect persists for 15 seconds after Dire Crows are repelled from the Survivor.
Darkest_Ink.name: Darkest Ink

Festering_Carrion.description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow takes flight by -0.5 seconds.
Festering_Carrion.name: Festering Carrion

Garden_of_Rot.description:
A nude self-portrait in which Carmina depicts a rotting darkness growing outwards from within.
  • When a Survivor completes the Repel action, they suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 4 seconds.

"I see no salvation in the rot." — Carmina Mora
Garden_of_Rot.name: Garden of Rot

Ink_Egg.description:
An unusual egg that seems to be nothing but a ball of semi-solid ink.
  • Increases the number of Dire Crows The Artist is able to hold by +1 Dire Crow.
  • Reduces the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by -2 seconds.

"Perhaps, covered in darkness as I was, they saw me as one of their own." — Carmina Mora
Ink_Egg.name: Ink Egg

Iridescent_Feather.description:
A glass-like feather moulded from The Fog itself.
Simple as it may be, it is a symbol of those who watch over Carmina.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect whenever Birds of Torment is on Cool-down and The Artist holds no Dire Crows.
  • Reduces the number of Dire Crows The Artist is able to hold by -1 Dire Crow.

"They saved me when I could not save myself." — Carmina Mora
Iridescent_Feather.name: Iridescent Feather

Matias'_Baby_Shoes.description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 5 metres of an idle Dire Crow are revealed to you for 3 seconds.

"See you soon, Matias." — Carmina Mora
Matias'_Baby_Shoes.name: Matias' Baby Shoes

O_Grief,_O_Lover.description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.
  • Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.
O_Grief,_O_Lover.name: O Grief, O Lover

Oil_Paints.description:
There is little left but a few globs of black and grey, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.
  • Increases the Killer Instinct Detection radius of Dire Crows by +1.5 metres.
Oil_Paints.name: Oil Paints

Severed_Hands.description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death.
The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.
  • Any Survivor within 3 metres of a Survivor, who is being swarmed by Dire Crows, will also be swarmed.

"How are you going to paint now?" — Hooded Man
Severed_Hands.name: Severed Hands

Severed_Tongue.description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death.
The sight instils rage not just in her, but in her crows.
  • Reduces the Slow-down duration of The Artist when Dire Crows take flight by -0.5 seconds.

"How are you going to tell poems now?" — Hooded Man
Severed_Tongue.name: Severed Tongue

Silver_Bell.description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to.
The clinking of the bell was a distraction to everyone but Carmina.
  • Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
Silver_Bell.name: Silver Bell

Still_Life_Crow.description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow.
Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.
  • Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +4 seconds.
Still_Life_Crow.name: Still Life Crow

Thick_Tar.description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece.
Once it sticks to skin, it is nearly impossible to get off.
  • Increases the time required by Survivors to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm by +0.5 seconds.
Thick_Tar.name: Thick Tar

Thorny_Nest.description:
A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home.
There are sharp thorns embedded in it.
  • Survivors damaged by Dire Crows suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects.
Thorny_Nest.name: Thorny Nest

Untitled_Agony.description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and trashes of black paint following Matias' death.
It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.
  • Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 1.5 seconds.
Untitled_Agony.name: Untitled Agony

Velvet_Fabric.description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project.
Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.
  • When a Survivor attempts to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm, the Swarm's Aura remains visible for another 1.5 seconds.
Velvet_Fabric.name: Velvet Fabric

Vibrant_Obituary.description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint.
It seems tragedy is a daily thing.
  • Increases the Killer Instinct duration of Dire Crows by +3 seconds.
Vibrant_Obituary.name: Vibrant Obituary

Adrenaline_Vial.description:
A hormone removed from an unwilling subject's adrenal gland. Though it provides a jolt of energy, it can fatigue its user.
  • Reduces the Token Regeneration time by -1 second per Token.
  • Increases the maximum Look angle during a Rush by +50 %.
  • Increases the available Rush Tokens by +2 Tokens.
  • Increases the Rush Movement speed by +10 %.
  • Decreases the Rush Turn rate by -0.5 °/s.

"Please, don't do this..."
Adrenaline_Vial.name: Adrenaline Vial

Alchemist's_Ring.description:
A ring given to chemists graduating from the London School of Medicine. It's a reminder of unrestrained ambition.
  • Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will instantly recharge all Rush Tokens.

"The student is accused of grave-robbing with the intent of unsanctioned scientific testing." — Faculty Reprimand of Talbot Grimes, 1838
Alchemist's_Ring.name: Alchemist's Ring

Blighted_Crow.description:
A dead crow that has been grotesquely mutated by Putrid Serum.
  • Increases Rush Movement speed by +6 % for each consecutive Rush.
Blighted_Crow.name: Blighted Crow

Blighted_Rat.description:
A rat that briefly returned to life when injected with Putrid Serum, becoming aggressive and uncontrollable.
  • Increases Rush Movement speed by +4 % for each consecutive Rush.
Blighted_Rat.name: Blighted Rat

Canker_Thorn.description:
A sizeable thorn snipped from a Visceral Canker. It secretes a mild toxin.
  • Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.5 seconds.
Canker_Thorn.name: Canker Thorn

Chipped_Monocle.description:
A monocle Talbot rarely used despite his eyesight weakening in later years.
  • Displays the target location of a Slam.
Chipped_Monocle.name: Chipped Monocle

Compound_Seven.description:
This early sample failed to achieve desired results, but demonstrated surprising effects regardless.
  • Automatically face the nearest Survivor within 16 metres after a Slam.
Compound_Seven.name: Compound Seven

Compound_Thirty-Three.description:
Talbot's penultimate attempt at a serum. Though it did not facilitate his escape, it did have powerful side effects.
  • Any Survivor within 16 metres of a Slam will suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds, reducing their Movement speed by -3 %.
  • Slamming into Pallets and Breakable Walls immediately destroys them, incurring a Cool-down of 1.5 seconds.

"Time is scarce. Let this be the one..." — Talbot Grimes
Compound_Thirty-Three.name: Compound Thirty-Three

Compound_Twenty-One.description:
A serum that's fatal to humans. It evokes beneficial qualities in those who are... something more.
  • When initiating a Slam, reveal the Aura of Survivors within 8 metres of the collision location for 3.5 seconds.
Compound_Twenty-One.name: Compound Twenty-One

Foxglove.description:
A poisonous plant that sparked Talbot's interest in chemistry. It rekindles deeply buried memories.
  • Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.25 seconds.
Foxglove.name: Foxglove

Iridescent_Blight_Tag.description:
A glass-like laboratory tag, moulded from The Fog itself. Either a gift from The Entity or a cruel jest to tag The Blight as he once did to others.
  • Upon using all Rush Tokens, your last Lethal Rush will put Survivors into the Dying State.

"Progress requires drastic change." — Talbot Grimes
Iridescent_Blight_Tag.name: Iridescent Blight Tag

Placebo_Tablet.description:
A pill that's utterly ineffective... or is it?
  • Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Rush Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
  • Decreases Rush Movement speed by -15 %.
Placebo_Tablet.name: Placebo Tablet

Plague_Bile.description:
A sample of The Plague's bile, distilled and treated with a mixture of chemicals.
  • Increases Rush Turn rate by +10 %.
Plague_Bile.name: Plague Bile

Pustula_Dust.description:
Dried Pustula Petals ground into a fine dust.
  • Increases Slam duration by +0.75 seconds.
Pustula_Dust.name: Pustula Dust

Rose_Tonic.description:
A mixture made with dried roses from the exceedingly rare New Moon Bouquet.
  • Increases Slam duration by +1 second.
Rose_Tonic.name: Rose Tonic

Shredded_Notes.description:
The remnants of Talbot's notes, they still contain some valuable information within.
  • Reduces Token Regeneration time by -0.33 seconds per Token.
  • Decreases available Rush Tokens by 1.
Shredded_Notes.name: Shredded Notes

Soul_Chemical.description:
A chemical squeezed from the pineal gland of a recently deceased Survivor.
  • During a Rush, the moment The Blight comes within 16 metres of a Survivor who is repairing or healing, trigger a tremendously difficult Skill Check for that Survivor.

Soul Chemical can activate once per Survivor per Rush.

Soul Chemical does not trigger for a Rush started within 16 metres of the Survivor.

"...suspected to cause atypical alterations in neural rhythmic activity." — Unlabelled Mystery School Text
Soul_Chemical.name: Soul Chemical

Summoning_Stone.description:
Talbot used this stone to carve what he believed was his research into the Opium Den's walls.
  • Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will call upon The Entity to block Pallets within a radius of 16 metres of your location for 15 seconds.

"Death is only the beginning."
Summoning_Stone.name: Summoning Stone

Umbra_Salts.description:
Regular sea salt that has momentarily passed through the Spirit World, altering its properties in the process.
  • Increases Rush Turn rate by +15 %.
Umbra_Salts.name: Umbra Salts

Vigo's_Journal.description:
The journal of a man who claimed to have returned from The Void. The knowledge within has practical applications.
  • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect while Rushing.

"In a wasteland of forgotten dreams and endless routine, the man with a way out is God." — Talbot Grimes
Vigo's_Journal.name: Vigo's Journal

Award-winning_Chilli.description:
A big bowl of spicy Chilli made famous thanks to prime meat.
  • Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash and Chainsaw Dash Window by +0.5 seconds.

"The secret's in the meat" — Drayton Sawyer
Award-winning_Chilli.name: Award-winning Chilli

Begrimed_Chains.description:
This chain is stained with a foul substance that debilitates anyone it touches.
  • Survivors drop their Items when hit with Bubba's Chainsaw.
Begrimed_Chains.name: Begrimed Chains

Carburettor_Tuning_Guide.description:
A crudely drawn guide to properly adjust and tune a Chainsaw carburettor.
  • The Chainsaw Dash automatically consumes all Tokens.
  • Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash by +0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Recharge rate of the Chainsaw Sweep by -0.28 c/s.
  • Reduces the Chainsaw Dash Movement speed by -2 %.
Carburettor_Tuning_Guide.name: Carburettor Tuning Guide

Chainsaw_File.description:
A file whose purpose is to hone Chainsaw chains.
  • Reduces the duration of the Tantrum by -0.5 seconds.
Chainsaw_File.name: Chainsaw File

Chilli.description:
A big bowl of steaming Chilli to keep you fresh and strong.
  • Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash and Chainsaw Dash Window by +0.25 seconds.

"I got some good barbecue here!" — Drayton Sawyer
Chilli.name: Chilli

Depth_Gauge_Rake.description:
Tool that increases the angle of the depth gauge, making the chain eat more "wood".
  • Increases the available Tokens by 1 Token.
  • Reduces the Charge speed of the Chainsaw Sweep by -18 %.
  • Reduces the Chainsaw Dash Movement speed by -2 %.
Depth_Gauge_Rake.name: Depth Gauge Rake

Grisly_Chains.description:
A chain with unusually hefty cutter teeth that leaves victims crippled even after being healed.
  • Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed when hit with Bubba's Chainsaw.

Grisly Chains does not stack with other instances of the Mangled Status Effect.
Grisly_Chains.name: Grisly Chains

Homemade_Muffler.description:
A makeshift exhaust system made of black gas pipes.
  • Reduces the duration of the Tantrum by -1 second.
Homemade_Muffler.name: Homemade Muffler

Iridescent_Flesh.description:
A thin slice of smooth, young flesh.
The veins shimmer with luminescent glow, as if life still flows within.
  • Replenishes all Tokens when hitting a Survivor with Bubba's Chainsaw.
  • Limits the maximum duration of the Tantrum to 5 seconds.

"There are moments when we cannot believe that what is happening is really true.
Pinch yourself and you may find out that it is." — Pam Jones
Iridescent_Flesh.name: Iridescent Flesh

Knife_Scratches.description:
Scratches cover the Chainsaw's body, caused by a searing blade.
Memories of reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
  • Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by +2 %.
  • Increases the Charge time of Bubba's Chainsaw by +12 %.
Knife_Scratches.name: Knife Scratches

Light_Chassis.description:
A light and durable Chainsaw chassis with a shorter guide bar.
Makes the Chainsaw easier to handle.
  • While revving the Chainsaw, see the Auras of all Survivors within 8 metres.
Light_Chassis.name: Light Chassis

Long_Guide_Bar.description:
A sturdy iron replacement bar for long chains.
  • Increases the Revving threshold before triggering a Tantrum by +2 seconds.
Long_Guide_Bar.name: Long Guide Bar

Primer_Bulb.description:
Pumps more gas in the ignition system to ensure a quick and powerful start.
  • Reduces the Token Recharge time by -1 second.
Primer_Bulb.name: Primer Bulb

Rusted_Chains.description:
This chain is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Survivors injured with Bubba's Chainsaw suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 90 seconds.

Rusted Chains does not stack with other instances of the Broken Status Effect.
Rusted_Chains.name: Rusted Chains

Shop_Lubricant.description:
An oil specifically formulated for Chainsaws.
A special additive prevents oil throw off.
  • Downing a Survivor with Bubba's Chainsaw while no other Survivors are in the Terror Radius will cloak that Survivor's Aura from other Survivors for 20 seconds.
Shop_Lubricant.name: Shop Lubricant

Spark_Plug.description:
A clean spark plug fitted for a Chainsaw.
  • Reduces the Token Recharge time by -0.5 seconds.
Spark_Plug.name: Spark Plug

Speed_Limiter.description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
  • Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
  • Hits with either Bubba's Chainsaw or the Chainsaw do not automatically trigger the Dying State.
Speed_Limiter.name: Speed Limiter

The_Beast's_Marks.description:
Jagged marks cover the Chainsaw's body, punishment from the dark beast that lives in The Fog.
Memories of violent reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
  • Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by +3 %.
  • Increases the Charge time of Bubba's Chainsaw by +12 %.
The_Beast's_Marks.name: The Beast's Marks

The_Grease.description:
A thick yellowish ooze, concocted by the Sawyers.
Used for all-purpose lubrication around their house.
  • Increases the Revving threshold before triggering a Tantrum by +3 seconds.
The_Grease.name: The Grease

Vegetable_Oil.description:
A rancid oil used as a poor quality lubricant.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Bubba's Chainsaw by -0.3 seconds.
Vegetable_Oil.name: Vegetable Oil

Bent_Nail.description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton's hand.
Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Chain Bound Score Event in the Deviousness Category.
  • Hits with Possessed Chains only spawn 1 additional Chain.
Bent_Nail.name: Bent Nail

Burning_Candle.description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.
  • Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -3 seconds.
Burning_Candle.name: Burning Candle

Chatterer's_Tooth.description:
A fragment from a Cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly.
This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.
  • Reveals the Lament Configuration to The Cenobite.
    Picking up the Lament Configuration has the following effects:
    • Deactivates an on-going Chain Hunt.
    • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.
Chatterer's_Tooth.name: Chatterer's Tooth

Engineer's_Fang.description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany Cenobites on their grim undertakings.
  • Possessed Chains injure Healthy Survivors, but do not bind them or spawn additional Chains.
  • Increases Gateway Closing time after hitting a healthy Survivor with a Possessed Chain by +0.25 seconds.
  • When hitting an injured Survivor with a Possessed Chain, only 1 additional Chain will spawn.

"We have such sights to show you." — Pinhead
Engineer's_Fang.name: Engineer's Fang

Flickering_Television.description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the Cenobites.
  • Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +4 metres.
Flickering_Television.name: Flickering Television

Frank's_Heart.description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother's blood.
  • Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +8 metres.

"Nobody escapes us." — Pinhead
Frank's_Heart.name: Frank's Heart

Greasy_Black_Lens.description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese Cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.
  • Reveals Survivors hit by Possessed Chains for 6 seconds.
Greasy_Black_Lens.name: Greasy Black Lens

Impaling_Wire.description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a Cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.
  • Summons 1 additional Chain if a Survivor uses the environment to break a Chain.
Impaling_Wire.name: Impaling Wire

Iridescent_Lament_Configuration.description:
A glass-like puzzle box moulded from The Fog itself.
This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.
  • While a Chain Hunt is inactive, Survivors beyond 24 metres of the Lament Configuration cannot see its Aura.

"You opened it. We came." — Pinhead
Iridescent_Lament_Configuration.name: Iridescent Lament Configuration

Larry's_Blood.description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.
  • Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +4 metres.
Larry's_Blood.name: Larry's Blood

Larry's_Remains.description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.
  • Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +2 seconds.

"We want the man who did this." — Pinhead
Larry's_Remains.name: Larry's Remains

Leather_Strip.description:
Leather strips torn from a Cenobite's uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.
  • Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.15 seconds.
Leather_Strip.name: Leather Strip

Liquified_Gore.description:
The result of summoning the Cenobites.
There is no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.
  • Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +1 second.
Liquified_Gore.name: Liquified Gore

Lively_Crickets.description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.
  • Increases Possessed Chain Turn rate by +10 %.
Lively_Crickets.name: Lively Crickets

Original_Pain.description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead's skull.
Such pleasure and pain.
  • Survivors who break free of Possessed Chains suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.

"No tears, please. It's a waste of good suffering." — Pinhead
Original_Pain.name: Original Pain

Skewered_Rat.description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home's rat problem.
  • Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.45 seconds.
Skewered_Rat.name: Skewered Rat

Slice_of_Frank.description:
A slab of Frank's face after his torture at the hand of the Cenobites.
  • Survivors carrying the Lament Configuration suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

"The Cenobites gave me an experience beyond limits. Pain and pleasure, indivisible." — Frank Cotton
Slice_of_Frank.name: Slice of Frank

Spoiled_Meal.description:
A pile of mould, feasted on by a cockroach.
Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton's mysterious disappearance...
  • Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +2 metres.
Spoiled_Meal.name: Spoiled Meal

Torture_Pillar.description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.
  • Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -6 seconds.

"This isn't for your eyes." — Pinhead
Torture_Pillar.name: Torture Pillar

Wriggling_Maggots.description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.
  • Increases Possessed Chains Turn rate by +15 %.
Wriggling_Maggots.name: Wriggling Maggots

Bottle_of_Chloroform.description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anaesthetic capabilities.
  • Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Tonic Gas Clouds by +20 %.
Bottle_of_Chloroform.name: Bottle of Chloroform

Cheap_Gin_Bottle.description:
The only remnant of a cheap good time and one hell of a headache.
  • Start the Trial with 2 additional Bottles.
  • Grants the ability to carry 2 additional Bottles.
Cheap_Gin_Bottle.name: Cheap Gin Bottle

Cigar_Box.description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers.
Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
  • Any Invigorated Player sees the Auras of all other Players within a radius of 16 metres.
Cigar_Box.name: Cigar Box

Ether_15_Vol%.description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
  • Increases the Intoxication duration by +1 second.
Ether_15_Vol%.name: Ether 15 Vol%

Fingerless_Parade_Gloves.description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel, the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
  • Increases the Throw speed of the Bottle by +25 %.
  • Decreases the Throw angle of the Bottle by -15 °.
Fingerless_Parade_Gloves.name: Fingerless Parade Gloves

Flask_of_Bleach.description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burns and lung damage.
  • Increases the strength of the Hindered Status Effect from Intoxication by an additional +4 %.
Flask_of_Bleach.name: Flask of Bleach

Garish_Make-Up_Kit.description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote.
The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effect.
  • Increases the Invigoration duration by +2 seconds.
Garish_Make-Up_Kit.name: Garish Make-Up Kit

Kerosene_Can.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
  • Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.
Kerosene_Can.name: Kerosene Can

Party_Bottle.description:
Be the life of the party!
  • Party Bottles emit confetti when they break, in addition to their usual Gas effect.
  • Hitting a Survivor directly with a Party Bottle interrupts their actions as usual, and additionally awards 100 bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Party_Bottle.name: Party Bottle

Redhead's_Pinkie_Finger.description:
The prized pinkie finger of a redhead.
Faintly fragrant.
Tastes of potpourri and varnish.
  • Survivors hit directly with the Bottle suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they are Intoxicated.
  • Reduces available Bottles by -3 Bottles.
Redhead's_Pinkie_Finger.name: Redhead's Pinkie Finger

Robin_Feather.description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time between Bottle Throws by -40 %.
Robin_Feather.name: Robin Feather

Smelly_Inner_Soles.description:
A mouldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
  • Increases Movement speed while Reloading by +66 %.
Smelly_Inner_Soles.name: Smelly Inner Soles

Solvent_Jug.description:
A chemical volatile compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of the Afterpiece Antidote.
  • Increases the Invigoration duration by +1 second.
Solvent_Jug.name: Solvent Jug

Spirit_of_Hartshorn.description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia.
One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
  • Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Antidote Gas Clouds by +20 %.
Spirit_of_Hartshorn.name: Spirit of Hartshorn

Starling_Feather.description:
A black feather with an emerald gloss, very soft to the touch.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time between Bottle Throws by -50 %.
Starling_Feather.name: Starling Feather

Sticky_Soda_Bottle.description:
An empty bottle, sticky with dried sugar and blood.
  • Start the Trial with 1 additional Bottle.
  • Grants the ability to carry 1 additional Bottle.
Sticky_Soda_Bottle.name: Sticky Soda Bottle

Sulphuric_Acid_Vial.description:
An odourless syrupy liquid with high corrosiveness.
  • Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.
Sulphuric_Acid_Vial.name: Sulphuric Acid Vial

Tattoo's_Middle_Finger.description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man.
Has a faint taste of machinery oil.
  • The Auras of both Intoxicated and Invigorated Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
Tattoo's_Middle_Finger.name: Tattoo's Middle Finger

Thick_Cork_Stopper.description:
A sturdy cork fitting the Afterpiece Tonic Bottles marvellously.
  • Reduces the Reload time by -0.5 seconds.
Thick_Cork_Stopper.name: Thick Cork Stopper

VHS_Porn.description:
An all time classic.
You will not see things quite the same again.
  • Afterpiece Tonic Gas Clouds are yellow.
  • Afterpiece Antidote Gas Clouds are purple.
VHS_Porn.name: VHS Porn

Barbed_Wire.description:
Pliable American-made steel lined with sharp barbs.
Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.
  • Increases Mending time by +3.5 seconds.

"There won't be nothing to fear soon. Till then, fear me." — Caleb Quinn
Barbed_Wire.name: Barbed Wire

Bayshore's_Cigar.description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb's boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
  • Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -1 second.

"Do not point that thing at me, you slack-jawed imbecile." — Henry Bayshore
Bayshore's_Cigar.name: Bayshore's Cigar

Bayshore's_Gold_Tooth.description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
  • Increases the Reeling speed by +9 %.

"Know your place, boy. Know you damn place." — Henry Bayshore
Bayshore's_Gold_Tooth.name: Bayshore's Gold Tooth

Chewing_Tobacco.description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale.
Stimulates the nervous system.
  • Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.
Chewing_Tobacco.name: Chewing Tobacco

Gold_Creek_Whiskey.description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb's anger and slowed his step.
  • Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -8 metres while Aiming Down Sights.

"A smooth taste for the rugged frontier." — Gold Creek Advertisement, 1876
Gold_Creek_Whiskey.name: Gold Creek Whiskey

Hellshire_Iron.description:
The Hellshire Gang's branding iron.
Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for as long as a Survivor is speared by The Redeemer.
    • This effect lingers for an additional 10 seconds.

"Hellshire Gang: Justice Seekers or Outlaws?" — Glenvale Gazette headline
Hellshire_Iron.name: Hellshire Iron

Honey_Locust_Thorn.description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
  • Survivors breaking free from The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.
Honey_Locust_Thorn.name: Honey Locust Thorn

Iridescent_Coin.description:
A glass-like coin moulded from The Fog itself.
A payment to the bounty hunter for the services rendered.
  • Survivors speared by The Redeemer from at least 12 metres away suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they remain speared.

"Deals made in desperation are paid for in madness."
Iridescent_Coin.name: Iridescent Coin

Jaw_Smasher.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.
It brings back burning desire for revenge.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +1.5 %.

"You called death to your door the instant you done me wrong." — Caleb Quinn
Jaw_Smasher.name: Jaw Smasher

Marshal's_Badge.description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang's bounties.
  • Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -4 metres while Aiming Down Sights.

"Get your prayers in, you'll be swinging by noon." — Caleb Quinn
Marshal's_Badge.name: Marshal's Badge

Modified_Ammo_Belt.description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialised weaponry.
Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
  • Reduces the Reload time by -0.25 seconds.
Modified_Ammo_Belt.name: Modified Ammo Belt

Poison_Oak_Leaves.description:
An ordinary-looking plant, Caleb found out that spears coated in its oil cause unbearable blistering around wound.
  • Increases Mending time by +1.5 seconds.
Poison_Oak_Leaves.name: Poison Oak Leaves

Prison_Chain.description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb's ankle.
It has been re-purposed to hook onto a spear.
  • Increases the time required for Survivors to break free from The Redeemer by +10 %.

"Inmates working beyond the prison yard must be affixed with a steel ball of no less than 18 pounds." — Hellshire Penitentiary Guard Book
Prison_Chain.name: Prison Chain

Rickety_Chain.description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun.
Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
  • Grants 50 % bonus Bloodpoints for Speared Score Events.
  • Increases the rate at which Survivors break free from The Redeemer by +33 %.
Rickety_Chain.name: Rickety Chain

Rusted_Spike.description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity.
The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
  • Survivors hit with The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.
Rusted_Spike.name: Rusted Spike

Snake_Oil.description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman.
Purported to cure all that ails you.
  • Increases the Reeling speed by +5 %.
Snake_Oil.name: Snake Oil

Spit_Polish_Rag.description:
A grimy piece of burlap.
Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the Speargun in the heat of a shootout.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.
Spit_Polish_Rag.name: Spit Polish Rag

Tin_Oil_Can.description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery.
Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.
Tin_Oil_Can.name: Tin Oil Can

Wanted_Poster.description:
The yellowed remains of a wanted poster for Mason Kelly.
It kept Caleb focused on the hunt.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +3 %.

"You'll be met with a fierce reckoning, swear it on my mum's grave." — Caleb Quinn
Wanted_Poster.name: Wanted Poster

Warden's_Keys.description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
  • Reduces the Reload time by -0.35 seconds.
Warden's_Keys.name: Warden's Keys

Barb's_Glasses.description:
A broken pair of glasses that travelled to the Upside Down.
  • Reduces the Shred Cool-down after breaking Breakable Walls or Pallets by -15 %.
Barb's_Glasses.name: Barb's Glasses

Black_Heart.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
  • Reduces the Shred Cool-down after successful Special Attacks by -15 %.
Black_Heart.name: Black Heart

Brass_Case_Lighter.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
  • While closing an activated Portal, Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
    • This effect lingers for 60 seconds.

"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory
Brass_Case_Lighter.name: Brass Case Lighter

Deer_Lung.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
  • Increases the Movement speed while teleporting between Portals by +30 %.
  • Reduces the number of available Portals by -2.
Deer_Lung.name: Deer Lung

Eleven's_Soda.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
  • While traversing the Upside Down, Generators which are actively being repaired are highlighted in yellow.
Eleven's_Soda.name: Eleven's Soda

Leprose_Lichen.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.
  • While traversing the Upside Down, the Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you.
    • This effect lingers for all Survivors within 16 metres of an active Portal for 3 seconds after emerging from a Portal.

"One small dose can cause severe hallucinations." — Hawkins National Laboratory
Leprose_Lichen.name: Leprose Lichen

Lifeguard_Whistle.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.
  • Survivors within the Area of Effect of activated Portals automatically trigger Killer Instinct without The Demogorgon having to charge Of the Abyss.
  • Reduces the Area of Effect radius by -1 metre.

"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory
Lifeguard_Whistle.name: Lifeguard Whistle

Mews'_Guts.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
  • Increases the number of available Portals by +1.
  • Reduces the Shred Cool-down of missed Special Attacks by -11 %.
Mews'_Guts.name: Mews' Guts

Rat_Liver.description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
  • Increases the Charging Movement speed of Of the Abyss by +3.5 %.
Rat_Liver.name: Rat Liver

Rat_Tail.description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
  • Increases the Opening speed of Portals by +50 %.
Rat_Tail.name: Rat Tail

Red_Moss.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.
  • Extends the Undetectable Status Effect after emerging from a Portal by +8 seconds.
  • Suppresses all noises of The Demogorgon emerging from a Portal.
  • Increases the time it takes The Demogorgon to emerge from a Portal by +15 %.

"Consuming its leaf enhances athletic performance and causes euphoria." — Hawkins National Laboratory
Red_Moss.name: Red Moss

Rotten_Green_Tripe.description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
  • Increases the Movement speed while teleporting between Portals by +15 %.
Rotten_Green_Tripe.name: Rotten Green Tripe

Rotten_Pumpkin.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
  • The Portals through which The Demogorgon enters the Upside Down are automatically sealed.
  • Grants 200 bonus Bloodpoints for traversing the Upside Down.
Rotten_Pumpkin.name: Rotten Pumpkin

Sticky_Lining.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the Area of Effect radius of activated Portals by +2.5 metres.
Sticky_Lining.name: Sticky Lining

Thorny_Vines.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the Area of Effect radius of activated Portals by +1 metre.
  • Increases the time it takes Survivors to seal activated Portals by +11 %.
Thorny_Vines.name: Thorny Vines

Unknown_Egg.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.
  • Reduces the Power Recovery time by -2.5 seconds.

"A large egg was sighted in the Upside Down, but no sample survived the trip to the lab for proper examination." — Hawkins National Laboratory
Unknown_Egg.name: Unknown Egg

Upside_Down_Resin.description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the time it takes Survivors to seal activated Portals by +40 %.

"A sample taken from the bark of the tree once used as a gate. So far our conclusion as to its effect are inconclusive." — Hawkins National Laboratory
Upside_Down_Resin.name: Upside Down Resin

Vermilion_Webcap.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.
  • Extends the Undetectable Status Effect after emerging from a Portal by +3 seconds.

"Still experimenting with this specimen, so far our results are inconsistent." — Hawkins National Laboratory
Vermilion_Webcap.name: Vermilion Webcap

Violet_Waxcap.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.
  • Extends the Undetectable Status Effect after emerging from a Portal by +1 second.
Violet_Waxcap.name: Violet Waxcap

Viscous_Webbing.description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the time it takes Survivors to seal activated Portals by +16 %.
Viscous_Webbing.name: Viscous Webbing

\"Calm\"_-_Carter's_Notes.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
Uses a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure causes uncontrollable fear and anxiety in the patient.
  • Increases The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready by +8 metres.
  • Reduces The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is on Cool-down by -8 metres.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

  • Madness II: Survivors intermittently (10-15 seconds active; 30-45 seconds inactive) hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.

"Higher quality seizures trigger catatonia. At least it gives me peace for the time it lasts." — Herman Carter
\"Calm\"_-_Carter's_Notes.name: "Calm" - Carter's Notes

\"Calm\"_-_Class_I.description:
An ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause mild anxiety in the patient.
  • Increases The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready by +4 metres.
  • Reduces The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is on Cool-down by -4 metres.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

  • Madness II: Survivors intermittently (10-15 seconds active; 30-45 seconds inactive) hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
\"Calm\"_-_Class_I.name: "Calm" - Class I

\"Calm\"_-_Class_II.description:
A risky ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause moderate anxiety in the patient.
  • Increases The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready by +6 metres.
  • Reduces The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is on Cool-down by -6 metres.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

  • Madness II': Survivors intermittently (10-15 seconds active; 30-45 seconds inactive) hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III': Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.

"Electro-convulsive therapy is one of the safest medical procedures." — Léry's Memorial Institute
\"Calm\"_-_Class_II.name: "Calm" - Class II

\"Discipline\"_-_Carter's_Notes.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
The intolerably high voltage leaves the patient in a severe state of paranoia.
  • Reduces the Detonation delay of Shock Therapy by -0.3 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

  • Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
    • This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
  • Madness III: Survivors constantly perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Red Stain.

"To avoid relapse from our most tenacious subjects, use maximum levels when proceeding with disciplinary actions." — Herman Carter
\"Discipline\"_-_Carter's_Notes.name: "Discipline" - Carter's Notes

\"Discipline\"_-_Class_II.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at high voltage.
Can cause a state of moderate paranoia in the patient.
  • Reduces the Detonation delay of Shock Therapy by -0.1 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

  • Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
    • This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
  • Madness III: Survivors constantly perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Red Stain.

"We re-educate our patients with the greatest care." — Léry's Memorial Institute
\"Discipline\"_-_Class_II.name: "Discipline" - Class II

\"Discipline\"_-_Class_III.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at very high voltage.
Can cause a state of serious paranoia in the patient.
  • Reduces the Detonation delay of Shock Therapy by -0.2 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

  • Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
    • This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
  • Madness III: Survivors constantly perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Red Stain.

"Respect of our patients is at the core of our principles." — Léry's Memorial Institute
\"Discipline\"_-_Class_III.name: "Discipline" - Class III

\"Order\"_-_Carter's_Notes.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
The long, constant stimulus leaves the patient in a state of severe confusion.
  • Reduces Cool-down duration of Static Blast by -6 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

  • Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
    • Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Pallets.

"The stimulus must be kept active at a convulsive level." — Herman Carter
\"Order\"_-_Carter's_Notes.name: "Order" - Carter's Notes

\"Order\"_-_Class_I.description:
A conventional ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute.
Can cause a state of mild confusion in the patient.
  • Reduces Cool-down duration of Static Blast by -2 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

  • Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
    • Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Pallets.
\"Order\"_-_Class_I.name: "Order" - Class I

\"Order\"_-_Class_II.description:
A high stimulus ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute.
Can cause a state of moderate confusion in the patient.
  • Reduces Cool-down duration of Static Blast by -4 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

  • Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
    • Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Pallets.

"Side effects are very rare." — Léry's Memorial Institute
\"Order\"_-_Class_II.name: "Order" - Class II

\"Restraint\"_-_Carter's_Notes.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog, crudely annotated.
Uses an unbearable stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause severe cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • When a Survivor's Madness increases a Tier, their Aura is revealed for 3 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

  • Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by +6 seconds.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Doctors.

"I CAN SEE THEIR DISGUSTING ILLNESSES ." — Unsigned Notes (potentially Herman Carter)
\"Restraint\"_-_Carter's_Notes.name: "Restraint" - Carter's Notes

\"Restraint\"_-_Class_II.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.
Uses a wavelength that links the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause mild cases of hallucination in the patient.
  • When a Survivor's Madness increases a Tier, their Aura is revealed for 1 second.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

  • Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by +6 seconds.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Doctors.
\"Restraint\"_-_Class_II.name: "Restraint" - Class II

\"Restraint\"_-_Class_III.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.
Uses a high stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause serious cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • When a Survivor's Madness increases a Tier, their Aura is revealed for 2 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

  • Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by +6 seconds.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Doctors.
\"Restraint\"_-_Class_III.name: "Restraint" - Class III

High_Stimulus_Electrode.description:
An experimental electrode that can withstand very high charges for a longer period of time.
  • Increases the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy by +4 metres.
High_Stimulus_Electrode.name: High Stimulus Electrode

Interview_Tape.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing an unedited interview of a victim.
Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
  • Changes Shock Therapy's Area of Effect into a narrow beam 24 metres in length and 2 metres in width.
Interview_Tape.name: Interview Tape

Iridescent_King.description:
A glass-like king chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.
The Entity's trace reverberating within can break the most powerful minds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from all available Afflictions: Calm, Discipline, Order, and Restraint.

  • Survivors intermittently (10-15 seconds active; 30-45 seconds inactive) hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
  • During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them.
    • This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends in Madness II and is constantly active in Madness III.
  • Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
    • Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.
  • Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by +6 seconds.

The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the various Afflictions, including the Auras of Illusionary Pallets and Doctors.

"Gazing into the iridescent glass is plunging one's self into madness."
Iridescent_King.name: Iridescent King

Iridescent_Queen.description:
A glass-like queen chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.
It cannot be touched without receiving a considerable jolt of electricity.

Any Survivor struck by the Shock Therapy or Static Blast Attack acquires a lingering Static Charge.

  • The Static Charge remains with the Survivor until it is discharged.
  • Any time a Survivor is within 4 metres of a Survivor carrying a Static Charge, both receive a shock identical to a Shock Therapy Attack and the Static Charge is discharged immediately.
  • If Survivors are within 4 metres of one another when being struck by the same Shock Therapy or Static Blast Attack, they do not acquire a Static Charge.

"Once we have established an effective method of treatment, we can focus on its efficient means of delivery." — Herman Carter
Iridescent_Queen.name: Iridescent Queen

Maple_Knight.description:
A white knight chess piece made of maple.
This gift from an old man brings back distant memories and imbues The Doctor with devastating focus.
  • Reveals the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy.
Maple_Knight.name: Maple Knight

Mouldy_Electrode.description:
A mouldy electrode which can nevertheless conduct a weak electrical current.
  • Increases the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy by +2 metres.
Mouldy_Electrode.name: Mouldy Electrode

Polished_Electrode.description:
A like-new standard electrode equipment to conduct electro-convulsive treatments.
  • Increases the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy by +3 metres.
Polished_Electrode.name: Polished Electrode

Scrapped_Tape.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing mostly white noise.
Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
  • Changes Shock Therapy's Area of Effect into a hollow ring, placed 8 metres in front of The Doctor, with an outer radius of 4.2 metres and an inner radius of 3 metres.
Scrapped_Tape.name: Scrapped Tape

Air_Freshener.description:
After her parents were found, this was in the bag of belongings the police returned.
Haddie does not know why she keeps it.
  • Start the Trial with 4 Power Tokens.
Air_Freshener.name: Air Freshener

Boat_Key.description:
Only one boat allowed people on and off the island, and the keys were hidden away to prevent deserters.
  • Increases the Teleportation speed by +25 % during Daytime.
  • Once the Exit Gates are powered by any means, all active Locks are instantly broken.
Boat_Key.name: Boat Key

Broken_Doll.description:
Followers brought their families to live in a utopia.
None of them were spared.
  • Increases the duration of Nightfall by 20 seconds.
Broken_Doll.name: Broken Doll

Burnt_Letters.description:
Some followers tried to write letters home.
Stamper ensured that nobody would have contact with the outside world.
  • Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for injuring a Survivor by +25 %.
Burnt_Letters.name: Burnt Letters

Caffeine_Tablets.description:
Stamper's followers were told not to sleep, or they would bring the wrath of Druanee upon them.
Towards the end, he brought in drugs from the mainland.
  • The Auras of locked Lockers are visible to you in yellow while charging The Gloaming or teleporting.
Caffeine_Tablets.name: Caffeine Tablets

Destroyed_Pillow.description:
While not allowed to sleep, leaders amongst the Ottomarians tore sleeping supplies to shreds to prevent malthinkers from sneaking off to nap.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -2.5 seconds during Nightfall.
Destroyed_Pillow.name: Destroyed Pillow

Fallen_Shingle.description:
After the Ottomarians were subsumed by The Dredge, the mansion fell into disrepair.
  • Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for using Reign of Darkness by +15 % per second.
Fallen_Shingle.name: Fallen Shingle

Field_Recorder.description:
Haddie documented all of her forays near Overlaps, to prove not only to the world but herself what she saw and felt.
  • Nightfall is active at the start of the Trial.
  • Nightfall activates automatically when the final Generator is completed.
  • Any Survivor coming into contact with the Remnant suffers from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.
Field_Recorder.name: Field Recorder

Follower's_Cowl.description:
They believed the cowls proved their enlightenment, but they merely kept them in darkness.
  • Returning back to the Remnant also triggers Killer Instinct during Daytime.
Follower's_Cowl.name: Follower's Cowl

Haddie's_Calendar.description:
She planned to cross out each day until her parents took her to India, but when tragedy struck, she abandoned her calendar.
  • Reduces the time to exit a locked Locker by -1 second.
Haddie's_Calendar.name: Haddie's Calendar

Iridescent_Wooden_Plank.description:
Once the journalist's blood stained the wooden boards of the stage, everything was set into motion for The Dredge's arrival.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for the final 12 seconds of Nightfall.

"She came here to poison your minds with fear! Do not let the fear in!" — Otto Stamper
Iridescent_Wooden_Plank.name: Iridescent Wooden Plank

Lavalier_Microphone.description:
She kept a lavalier mic nearby, allowing her to record her innermost feelings when under great stress.
  • Consuming the last Power Token will reveal the Auras of all Survivors for 3 seconds.
  • Entering a Locker through teleportation causes all Lockers within 6 metres of any Survivor to open and slam their doors.
Lavalier_Microphone.name: Lavalier Microphone

Malthinker's_Skull.description:
Those who brought negativity to the commune would mysteriously disappear from time to time.
Their remains were never found... until The Dredge brought them up.
  • Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for when Survivors are injured by +66 % per second.
Malthinker's_Skull.name: Malthinker's Skull

Mortar_and_Pestle.description:
Disconnected from the world and modern medicine, Stamper's followers originally had to make do with the flora local to the island.
  • The Dredge emerges from the Remnant facing the same direction as a Teleport is activated instead of facing the direction the Remnant was placed in.
Mortar_and_Pestle.name: Mortar and Pestle

Ottomarian_Writing.description:
The words of Otto Stamper were the only words available for his followers to read, decrying malthink and malspeak.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -4 seconds during Daytime.
Ottomarian_Writing.name: Ottomarian Writing

Sacrificial_Knife.description:
When a journalist attempted to warn the Ottomarians of Stamper's true task, he slit her throat as a warning to any dissenters.
  • Exiting a Locker during Nightfall blocks all Vault locations within 16 metres of it for 5 seconds.

"There are imposters amongst you! They intend to destroy our perfect home with dark thoughts. Find them and bring them to me!" — Otto Stamper
Sacrificial_Knife.name: Sacrificial Knife

Tilling_Blade.description:
The island was self-sufficient, and followers tilled the tough soil to grow crops during the warm season.
  • Healthy Survivors injured during Nightfall suffer from the Blindness, Haemorrhage, and the Mangled Status Effects for 60 seconds.

"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."
Tilling_Blade.name: Tilling Blade

War_Helmet.description:
While investigating an Overlap in the Alps, she found an abandoned war bunker.
She took a helmet from it after the Overlap nearly took her.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1.5 seconds during Nightfall.
War_Helmet.name: War Helmet

Wooden_Plank.description:
A wooden plank torn from the stage where Otto Stamper sacrificed a meddling journalist.
  • Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for hooking a Survivor by +25 %.
Wooden_Plank.name: Wooden Plank

Worry_Stone.description:
While the Ottomarians were told to think only positive thoughts, some kept these stones in their pockets to rub when negative thoughts arose.
  • Reveals the Aura of a Survivor for 6 seconds when they lock a Locker.
Worry_Stone.name: Worry Stone

Black_Strap.description:
A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The colour makes it difficult to see the blood-soaked into it.
  • Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +0.5 metres.
Black_Strap.name: Black Strap

Burning_Man_Painting.description:
A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.
  • Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1.5 metres.
Burning_Man_Painting.name: Burning Man Painting

Cinderella_Music_Box.description:
A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella, found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.
  • Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +15 seconds.
Cinderella_Music_Box.name: Cinderella Music Box

Copper_Ring.description:
Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It's engraved with a picture of a spider.
  • Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +1 second.

"I was locked up inside the basement's basement. It was so small and dark, and I was so afraid. I dropped my precious ring. But I'll never ever go back there."
Copper_Ring.name: Copper Ring

Crimson_Ceremony_Book.description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.
  • Injured Survivors affected by Torment suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect.

"Speak! I am the Crimson One! The lies and the mist are not they, but I!"
Crimson_Ceremony_Book.name: Crimson Ceremony Book

Dead_Butterfly.description:
A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It's frail and nearly falls apart when touched.
  • Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -2 seconds.
Dead_Butterfly.name: Dead Butterfly

Forgotten_Videotape.description:
A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.
  • Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -3 seconds.
Forgotten_Videotape.name: Forgotten Videotape

Iridescent_Seal_of_Metatron.description:
A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it.
The Entity's influence seems to have altered it.
  • When sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement, the Auras of all other Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed for 6 seconds.

"This magic square, with strong protective and dispelling properties, is called the 'Virun VII Crest' or the 'Seal of Metatron'."
Iridescent_Seal_of_Metatron.name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron

Lead_Ring.description:
Found in a refrigerator. It's engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.
  • Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +10 seconds.
Lead_Ring.name: Lead Ring

Leopard-Print_Fabric.description:
A shred of pink, leopard-print fabric. It's difficult to tell what it was used for.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +0.5 seconds.

"It doesn't matter who I am. I'm here for you, James." — Maria
Leopard-Print_Fabric.name: Leopard-Print Fabric

Lost_Memories_Book.description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.
  • Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 15 seconds.

"They called this place 'The Place of the Silent Spirits'."
Lost_Memories_Book.name: Lost Memories Book

Mannequin_Foot.description:
The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.
  • Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +20 seconds.
Mannequin_Foot.name: Mannequin Foot

Misty_Day,_Remains_of_Judgement.description:
A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +1 second.

"It's him..."
Misty_Day,_Remains_of_Judgement.name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgement

Obsidian_Goblet.description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.
  • The Executioner gains the Undetectable Status Effect when standing on a Rites of Judgement trail.

"Forgive me for waking you. But without you, I just can't go on." — James Sunderland
Obsidian_Goblet.name: Obsidian Goblet

Rust-Coloured_Egg.description:
An old-looking egg, coloured reddish orange, about the size of a quail's egg.
  • Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

"James... you made me happy." — Mary
Rust-Coloured_Egg.name: Rust-Coloured Egg

Scarlet_Egg.description:
A fresh egg, strikingly red in colour, about the size of a quail's egg.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +3 seconds.

"I've never been so scared in my whole life! You couldn't care less about me... could you?" — Maria
Scarlet_Egg.name: Scarlet Egg

Spearhead.description:
The sharp, rusted tip of a spear. It's flaked with blood from its last victim.
  • Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by 1.5 seconds.
Spearhead.name: Spearhead

Tablet_of_the_Oppressor.description:
A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.
  • Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +2 seconds.
Tablet_of_the_Oppressor.name: Tablet of the Oppressor

Valtiel_Sect_Photograph.description:
A photograph of two figures in red hoods. Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.
  • Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -4 seconds.
Valtiel_Sect_Photograph.name: Valtiel Sect Photograph

Wax_Doll.description:
A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgement.
  • Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1 metre.
Wax_Doll.name: Wax Doll

\"Ghost_Face_Caught_on_Tape\".description:
A tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorised Roseville.
  • Putting a Survivor into the Dying State with a Basic Attack immediately recharges Night Shroud.

"In this footage, a dark figure is seen entering a house late at night in Northern Roseville, Florida.
The police were called the next morning to report a murder in the area.
Lock your doors: a Killer is in our midst, roaming freely, like a ghost in the night." — The Roseville Gazette
\"Ghost_Face_Caught_on_Tape\".name: "Ghost Face Caught on Tape"

\"Philly\".description:
A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before.
The film inside captured his last night in the city.
  • Reduces the time required to Mark a Survivor by -20 %.

"Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I do not wanna forget any of it." — The Ghost Face
\"Philly\".name: "Philly"

Cheap_Cologne.description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol.
Worn by The Ghost Face to make his presence known.
Reserved for impromptu visits.
  • Increases the time Survivors stay Marked by +10 seconds.
Cheap_Cologne.name: Cheap Cologne

Chewed_Pen.description:
A blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA.
Incriminating evidence that was never found.
  • Increases the time dying Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.
Chewed_Pen.name: Chewed Pen

Cinch_Straps.description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
  • Night Shroud remains active after missing a Basic Attack.
Cinch_Straps.name: Cinch Straps

Driver's_License.description:
A driver's license revealing Olsen's true identity:
Danny Johnson.
  • When Marking a Survivor repairing a Generator, the Generator explodes and loses -20 % of its Progression.
  • The affected Generator becomes blocked for the next 15 seconds.
  • Marking multiple Survivors on the same Generator will only apply the penalty once.

"They all want to know who Ghost Face is. But what they should ask is, who is next." — The Ghost Face
Driver's_License.name: Driver's License

Drop-Leg_Knife_Sheath.description:
A sheath allowing for a full motion range:
ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely.
Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
  • Grants a 10 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after Marking a Survivor.

"Gotta get ready like a scout — without the stupid patches. What I get is much better." — The Ghost Face
Drop-Leg_Knife_Sheath.name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath

Headline_Cut-Outs.description:
Cut-outs of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania.
While The Ghost Face just authored some of the headlines, he committed all of the murders.
Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
  • Increases Movement speed while Stalking by +40 %.
Headline_Cut-Outs.name: Headline Cut-Outs

Knife_Belt_Clip.description:
A perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly.
No one knows what you are planning to do tonight.
  • Reduces the Terror Radius of The Ghost Face by -12 metres while crouching.
Knife_Belt_Clip.name: Knife Belt Clip

Lasting_Perfume.description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by The Ghost Face to announce his presence.
Reserved for the victims he planned to write about.
  • Increases the time hooked Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.
Lasting_Perfume.name: Lasting Perfume

Leather_Knife_Sheath.description:
A quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade.
Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
  • Increases Crouch Movement speed by +10 %.
Leather_Knife_Sheath.name: Leather Knife Sheath

Marked_Map.description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida.
Each 'X' represents a victim of The Ghost Face.
Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration when The Ghost Face is revealed by +2 seconds.
Marked_Map.name: Marked Map

Night_Vision_Monocular.description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness.
Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
  • Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 10 seconds.
Night_Vision_Monocular.name: Night Vision Monocular

Olsen's_Address_Book.description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing.
All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
  • Marked Survivors rushing an action reveal their Aura for 5 seconds.
Olsen's_Address_Book.name: Olsen's Address Book

Olsen's_Journal.description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries.
The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.
Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
  • Marked Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect until the Mark expires.
Olsen's_Journal.name: Olsen's Journal

Olsen's_Wallet.description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim.
Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
  • Breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall immediately recharges Night Shroud.
Olsen's_Wallet.name: Olsen's Wallet

Outdoor_Security_Camera.description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed The Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville.
The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of The Ghost Face without providing any real clue to the police.
  • Putting a Marked Survivor into the Dying State reveals the Auras of all Survivors for 7 seconds.

"An image is worth a thousand words." — The Ghost Face
Outdoor_Security_Camera.name: Outdoor Security Camera

Telephoto_Lens.description:
A manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
  • Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Telephoto_Lens.name: Telephoto Lens

Victim's_Detailed_Routine.description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville.
Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
  • Whenever a Survivor is Marked by The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

"I have been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people do not forget." — The Ghost Face
Victim's_Detailed_Routine.name: Victim's Detailed Routine

Walleye's_Matchbook.description:
A sheet of matches from Walleyes, a small bar in Northern Roseville.
A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue.
One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
  • Reduces the Power Recovery time by -6 seconds.
Walleye's_Matchbook.name: Walleye's Matchbook

Automatic_Screwdriver.description:
A good way to make mechanical adjustments on the fly.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by -15 % after missing a Slice & Dice Attack.
Automatic_Screwdriver.name: Automatic Screwdriver

Doll_Eyes.description:
One of the advantages of possessing a mass-produced doll is easy access to replacement parts.
  • When in Hidey-Ho Mode, the Auras of all Windows and downed Pallets are revealed to you within 20 metres.
Doll_Eyes.name: Doll Eyes

Electric_Carving_Knife.description:
The annoying buzzing sound means it is ready to carve some flesh.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of missed Slice & Dice Attacks to 90 % of their default duration.
Electric_Carving_Knife.name: Electric Carving Knife

Good_Guy_Box.description:
Someone kept this box around in case they needed to bring Chucky back to the store.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of successful Slice & Dice Attacks to 85 % of their default duration.
Good_Guy_Box.name: Good Guy Box

Hair_Spray_&_Candle.description:
An aerosolised inferno that will ensure a bad hair day is the least of your worries.
  • Reduces the Power-Gauge penalty of Basic Attacks when in Hidey-Ho Mode by -12.5 %.
Hair_Spray_&_Candle.name: Hair Spray & Candle

Hard_Hat.description:
Keeps the dome intact while performing high-impact activities
  • Instantly breaks Pallets when performing a Scamper under them.
  • Automatically ends Hidey-Ho Mode.

"A true classic never goes out of style." — Chucky
Hard_Hat.name: Hard Hat

Iridescent_Amulet.description:
A pendant of great power, recreated within the Realm.
  • Extends the duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by +100 %.
  • Basic Attacks automatically end Hidey-Ho Mode.

"If I don't get out of this body soon, I'm screwed." — Chucky
Iridescent_Amulet.name: Iridescent Amulet

Jump_Rope_(Playtime's_Over).description:
Good for a bit of exercise, or for tying up your target.
  • Extends the duration of Slice & Dice to 130 % of its default duration.
Jump_Rope_(Playtime's_Over).name: Jump Rope

Mirror_Shards.description:
A bunch of shattered mirror pieces that reflect light and shadow, further disorienting the already disoriented.
  • Grants the ability to see the Illusory Footfalls around Survivors.
Mirror_Shards.name: Mirror Shards

Pile_of_Nails.description:
It's a lot easier to stay hidden when your target is worried about a pile of nails flying at their head.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 5 secondsafter manually ending Hidey-Ho Mode.
Pile_of_Nails.name: Pile of Nails

Plastic_Bag.description:
Nothing tires out a kill like a lack of oxygen.
  • Survivors walking through an Illusory Footfall suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.
Plastic_Bag.name: Plastic Bag

Portable_TV.description:
Small enough for any room.
Just keep it out of the bath.
  • Extends the duration of Slice & Dice to 200 % of its default duration once the Exit Gates have been powered.
Portable_TV.name: Portable TV

Power_Drill.description:
Comes with a dozen convenient drill tips.
They all make a big mess when applied to people.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by -20 % after successful Slice & Dice Attacks.
Power_Drill.name: Power Drill

Rat_Poison.description:
The secret ingredient in a killer chilli.
  • While performing a Slice & Dice Attack, the Auras of all Survivors within 8 metres of you are revealed to you for 5 seconds.
Rat_Poison.name: Rat Poison

Running_Shoes.description:
The latest in high-performance killer doll athletic technology.
  • Performing a Scamper grants a +4 % Haste Status Effect for 3 seconds.
Running_Shoes.name: Running Shoes

Silk_Pillow.description:
For when you want to smother your target with silky-smooth softness.
  • Permanently reduces your Terror Radius by -4 metres.
  • Increases the Charge time of Slice & Dice to 175 % of its default duration.
Silk_Pillow.name: Silk Pillow

Straight_Razor.description:
For when a close shave needs to be really, really close.
  • Survivors hit with successful Slice & Dice Attacks suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects.
Straight_Razor.name: Straight Razor

Strobing_Light.description:
With the right training, it can be used to make people more suggestible.
  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -4 metres, when Hidey-Ho Mode is on cool-down.
Strobing_Light.name: Strobing Light

Tiny_Scalpel.description:
Sometimes, a precision cut can lead to a beautiful bleed.
  • When in Hidey-Ho Mode, Pools of Blood appear to you in bright red.
Tiny_Scalpel.name: Tiny Scalpel

Yardstick.description:
Good for measuring distance.
Even better for laying down a beating.
  • Performing a Scamper reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 20 metres of you for 5 seconds.
Yardstick.name: Yardstick

Bloodied_Mud.description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson.
The bloody layers empower the mud.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +30 %.
Bloodied_Mud.name: Bloodied Mud

Bloodied_Water.description:
Tainted water contained in a folded water lily leaf.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +20 %.
Bloodied_Water.name: Bloodied Water

Bog_Water.description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +10 %.
Bog_Water.name: Bog Water

Cracked_Turtle_Egg.description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +35 %.
Cracked_Turtle_Egg.name: Cracked Turtle Egg

Cypress_Necklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +20 %.
Cypress_Necklet.name: Cypress Necklet

Dead_Fly_Mud.description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies.
Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +20 %.
Dead_Fly_Mud.name: Dead Fly Mud

Disfigured_Ear.description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear.
Deformed due to several hits to the head.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Triggering a Phantasm Trap causes the Survivor to be deafened for 6 seconds.
Disfigured_Ear.name: Disfigured Ear

Dragonfly_Wings.description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp.
Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +25 %.
Dragonfly_Wings.name: Dragonfly Wings

Dried_Cicada.description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash; crispy.
Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +30 %.
Dried_Cicada.name: Dried Cicada

Grandma's_Heart.description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

Triggering a Phantasm Trap causes the following effects for its tripped duration:

  • Suppresses the Terror Radius of The Hag.
  • Increases the Fake Terror Radius of the Mud Phantasms to 16 metres.

"Bring me another slice of the girl." — Grandma
Grandma's_Heart.name: Grandma's Heart

Half_Eggshell.description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +30 %.
Half_Eggshell.name: Half Eggshell

Mint_Rag.description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Grants The Hag the ability to teleport to any untripped Phantasm Trap at will.

Mint Rag applies a cool-down of 15 seconds to teleports between un-tripped Phantasm Traps.
This cool-down does not extend to regular teleports to tripped Phantasm Traps.
Mint_Rag.name: Mint Rag

Powdered_Eggshell.description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +25 %.
Powdered_Eggshell.name: Powdered Eggshell

Pussy_Willow_Catkins.description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
  • The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 3 seconds.
Pussy_Willow_Catkins.name: Pussy Willow Catkins

Rope_Necklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +15 %.
Rope_Necklet.name: Rope Necklet

Rusty_Shackles.description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Tripped Phantasm Traps do not spawn a Mud Phantasm.
  • Tripped Phantasm Traps do not give any indication of having been tripped to Survivors.
Rusty_Shackles.name: Rusty Shackles

Scarred_Hand.description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Mud Phantasms have collision with Survivors.
  • Grants 300 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
  • Disables The Hag's ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.

Scarred Hand trumps all other Add-ons.

"..." — The Butcher
Scarred_Hand.name: Scarred Hand

Swamp_Orchid_Necklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
  • Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +25 %.
Swamp_Orchid_Necklet.name: Swamp Orchid Necklet

Waterlogged_Shoe.description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Hag by +4.5 % to 4.6 m/s.
  • Survivors suffer from a Hindered Status Effect while inside a Phantasm Trap's Trigger range, reducing their Movement speed by -9 %.
  • Disables the ability of The Hag to teleport to triggered Phantasm Traps.
