Waterlogged Shoe trumps all other Add-ons.
Waterlogged_Shoe.name: Waterlogged Shoe

Willow_Wreath.description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
  • The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 5 seconds.
Willow_Wreath.name: Willow Wreath

Apex_Muffler.description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.
  • Silences the Chainsaw for all Survivors outside of the Terror Radius.
Apex_Muffler.name: Apex Muffler

Big_Buckle.description:
A glorious, shining belt worn by many good ol' country boys.
  • Reduces the Terror Radius by -8 metres while overheated.
Big_Buckle.name: Big Buckle

Black_Grease.description:
Thick grease that can be applied beneath the eyes to reduce glare.
  • Increases the Charge speed of the Chainsaw by +18 % for 30 seconds after being blinded.
Black_Grease.name: Black Grease

Dad's_Boots.description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Senior.
  • Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +28 %.
Dad's_Boots.name: Dad's Boots

Death_Engravings.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body counting the amount of lives it took.
Fills the user with determination.
  • Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +15 %.
  • Reduces the Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by -14 %.
  • Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.
Death_Engravings.name: Death Engravings

Doom_Engravings.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in the Fog.
Fills the user with determination.
  • Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +20 %.
  • Reduces the Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by -14 %.
  • Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.
Doom_Engravings.name: Doom Engravings

Heavy_Clutch.description:
A well-made clutch that keeps the chain moving smoothly.
  • Reduces the Collision Zone width of the Chainsaw by -30 %.
Heavy_Clutch.name: Heavy Clutch

Iridescent_Brick.description:
Once representative of Max Junior's confinement, this was the first brick to fall when his room's barricade came crashing down.
  • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect until you stop sprinting after maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for 2 seconds.

"What kinda ruckus you stirrin', boy?" — Max Thompson Sr.
Iridescent_Brick.name: Iridescent Brick

Junkyard_Air_Filter.description:
A cracked and dusty filter.
It still manages to work better than the stock model.
  • Increases the Overheat limit of the Chainsaw by +20 Charges.
Junkyard_Air_Filter.name: Junkyard Air Filter

Leafy_Mash.description:
A wet mash of fragrant leaves that mask a hunter's scent when stalking prey.
  • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds after hitting a Survivor with the Chainsaw.
Leafy_Mash.name: Leafy Mash

LoPro_Chains.description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater manoeuvrability.
  • Allows you to continue the Chainsaw Sprint after breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall with the Chainsaw.
  • Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of breaking a Pallet or a Breakable Wall are only damaged for a single Health State.
LoPro_Chains.name: LoPro Chains

Low_Kickback_Chains.description:
A specialised chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -28 % .
Low_Kickback_Chains.name: Low Kickback Chains

Mother's_Helpers.description:
A small number of caffeine pills found in Evelyn Thompson's purse.
Side effects include nervousness and irritability.
  • Reduces the Charge time of the Chainsaw by -18 % for 30 seconds after being stunned by a Pallet.

"Doctor, please, more of these!" — Evelyn Thompson
Mother's_Helpers.name: Mother's Helpers

Off-Brand_Motor_Oil.description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
  • Reduces the range within which Chainsaw noises can be heard by -30 %.
Off-Brand_Motor_Oil.name: Off-Brand Motor Oil

Pighouse_Gloves.description:
Rancid smelling gloves, soiled with unknown substances.
Despite everything wrong with them, they do have thick fabric.
While the Chainsaw is overheated:
  • Increases your Action speed when damaging Generators and breaking Pallets or Breakable Walls by +20 %.
  • Reduces the Pallet Stun duration by -50 %.

"Ain't no mess can stain a hard-workin' man's soul." — Max Thompson Sr.
Pighouse_Gloves.name: Pighouse Gloves

Punctured_Muffler.description:
A roughly modified muffler that allows for extra air flow.
  • Increases the Cooling speed of the Chainsaw by +50 %.
Punctured_Muffler.name: Punctured Muffler

Speed_Limiter.description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
  • Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
  • Hits with either Bubba's Chainsaw or the Chainsaw do not automatically trigger the Dying State.
Speed_Limiter.name: Speed Limiter

Spiked_Boots.description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow into mud for more stability and control with each step.
  • Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +44 %.
  • Increases the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by +28 %.
Spiked_Boots.name: Spiked Boots

Steel_Toe_Boots.description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -12 %.
Steel_Toe_Boots.name: Steel Toe Boots

Tuned_Carburettor.description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburettor has been well adjusted.
  • Reduces the Charge time of the Chainsaw by -25 %.
  • Reduces the base Movement speed of The Hillbilly to 4.4 m/s.
Tuned_Carburettor.name: Tuned Carburettor

Amanita_Toxin.description:
A toxin from the Amanita mushroom, applied to the Hatchet's blade.
It numbs the mind.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Amanita_Toxin.name: Amanita Toxin

Bandaged_Haft.description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchet's haft.
  • Reduces Cool-down duration in-between Hatchet Throws by -10 %.
Bandaged_Haft.name: Bandaged Haft

Begrimed_Head.description:
This Hatchet head is stained with a foul substance that afflicts anyone who it touches with debilities.
  • Survivors hit with Hunting Hatchets suffer from the Mangled and Haemorrhage Status Effects until healed.

Begrimed Head does not stack.
Begrimed_Head.name: Begrimed Head

Coarse_Stone.description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good.
A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.
  • Increases the volume of Survivors' Grunts of Pain by +50 % until they are healed, if they are hit by Hatchets.
Coarse_Stone.name: Coarse Stone

Deerskin_Gloves.description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.
  • Reduces Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.
Deerskin_Gloves.name: Deerskin Gloves

Flower_Babushka.description:
A clean and colourful handkerchief adorned with a flower pattern.
This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Reduces Wind-up time by -12 %.
Flower_Babushka.name: Flower Babushka

Glowing_Concoction.description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets have their Aura revealed to you for 5 seconds.
Glowing_Concoction.name: Glowing Concoction

Infantry_Belt.description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier.
Its multiple leather loops and holsters are useful to transport tools.
  • Start the Trial with 2 additional Hatchets.
  • Grants the ability to carry 2 additional Hatchets.
Infantry_Belt.name: Infantry Belt

Iridescent_Head.description:
A glass-like Hatchet head moulded from The Fog itself.
The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets are automatically put into the Dying State.
  • Caps the Carrying capacity of Hatchets at 1 Hatchet.
    • This cannot be altered by other Add-ons.

"The iridescent glass cuts through flesh and soul."
Iridescent_Head.name: Iridescent Head

Leather_Loop.description:
This leather strip tied into a loop can be attached to a belt to allow easy transportation of tools.
  • Start the Trial with 1 additional Hatchet.
  • Grants the ability to carry 1 additional Hatchet.
Leather_Loop.name: Leather Loop

Manna_Grass_Braid.description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass.
This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Reduces Wind-up time by -8 %.
Manna_Grass_Braid.name: Manna Grass Braid

Oak_Haft.description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.
  • Reduces Cool-down duration in-between Hatchet Throws by -20 %.
Oak_Haft.name: Oak Haft

Rose_Root.description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.
  • Increases the Flight speed of Hatchets by +20 %.
Rose_Root.name: Rose Root

Rusty_Head.description:
This Hatchet head is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal from.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

Rusty Head does not stack.
Rusty_Head.name: Rusty Head

Shiny_Pin.description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen.
Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.
  • Increases Movement speed during Wind-up by +5 %.
Shiny_Pin.name: Shiny Pin

Soldier's_Puttee.description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier.
It provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Huntress to 4.6 m/s whenever she is out of Hatchets.
Soldier's_Puttee.name: Soldier's Puttee

Venomous_Concoction.description:
A toxic concoction, applied to the Hatchet's blade.
The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus Snake venom, which gives it fatiguing capabilities.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.
Venomous_Concoction.name: Venomous Concoction

Weighted_Head.description:
An oddly weighted Hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target.
It requires a wielder with a strong arm.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Incapacitated Status Effect for 10 seconds.
Weighted_Head.name: Weighted Head

Wooden_Fox.description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches.
A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 30 seconds when Reloading.
Wooden_Fox.name: Wooden Fox

Yellowed_Cloth.description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.
  • Increases the Flight speed of Hatchets by +10 %.
Yellowed_Cloth.name: Yellowed Cloth

Battle_Axe_Head.description:
Sander Rault was a tower of a man, terrifying in form and demeanour.
  • The Carnifex appears twice in a row while cycling through Guardia Compagnia.
Battle_Axe_Head.name: Battle Axe Head

Blacksmith's_Hammer.description:
In their hands, everything was a weapon.
  • If a Survivor escapes a Guard Hunt by any means other than grabbing the Standard, they will suffer from a -3 % Hindered Status Effect and the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.
Blacksmith's_Hammer.name: Blacksmith's Hammer

Broken_Hilt.description:
A fresh weapon is clean, even surgical; an attack with a broken one is malicious and desperate.
  • Guards inflict the Mangled Status Effect when damaging a Survivor.
Broken_Hilt.name: Broken Hilt

Call_to_Arms.description:
Posted across many towns, lords desperate to protect their riches posted for able-bodied mercenaries.
None survived.
  • Increases the maximum Patrol Path length by +10 metres.
  • Increases the Path Drawing Movement speed by +2.2 m/s.
Call_to_Arms.name: Call to Arms

Chain_Mail_Fragment.description:
Downtime was spent repairing their armour, to avoid being on the receiving end of a fatal blow.
  • Guards inflict the Haemorrhage Status Effect when damaging a Survivor.
Chain_Mail_Fragment.name: Chain Mail Fragment

Cold_Steel_Manacles.description:
Alejandro Santiago, The Jailer, apprenticed as an armourer, and showed no remorse.
  • The Jailer appears twice in a row while cycling through Guardia Compagnia.
Cold_Steel_Manacles.name: Cold Steel Manacles

Dried_Horsemeat.description:
Long campaigns often required restocking, and the steeds of fallen enemies were as good as any farm-fresh ration.
  • Increases the Hunt duration of Guards by +4 seconds.
Dried_Horsemeat.name: Dried Horsemeat

Flint_and_Steel.description:
Attacks at night were not uncommon.
Fear was often their greatest ally.
  • After summoning The Carnifex , the Auras of all Survivors within 24 metres of any unbroken dropped Pallets are revealed to The Knight for 5 seconds.
Flint_and_Steel.name: Flint and Steel

Grim_Iron_Mask.description:
No method of torture was too base for Guardia Compagnia.
Pain and humiliation went hand-in-hand.
  • When a Guard detects a Survivor during a Patrol, the Survivor will suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for the next 60 seconds.
Grim_Iron_Mask.name: Grim Iron Mask

Gritty_Lump.description:
A rock-hard, dense loaf filled their stomachs on most days, giving them the energy to commit truly heinous acts.
  • Increases the Movement speed of Guards on Patrol by +9 %.
Gritty_Lump.name: Gritty Lump

Healing_Poultice.description:
Their reputation was so large, so horrible, that the mere knowledge that they were coming was enough to bring people to their knees.
  • After summoning The Assassin , all Survivors within 24 metres of The Assassin's spawn location scream and reveal their location for 5 seconds.
Healing_Poultice.name: Healing Poultice

Iridescent_Company_Banner.description:
Where this banner was raised, those who called themselves 'civilised' ran and hid, because for all their codes and laws, they had nothing resembling actual strength.
  • Drawing a Patrol Path through Windows blocks them for all Survivors for 15 seconds after summoning a Guard.
  • The Exit Gates are blocked by Entity Spikes for the Hunted Survivor.
  • All Windows vaulted by the Hunted Survivor are blocked for all Survivors for the remainder of the Hunt.

"They huddle in their villages like parasites! They have lost the drive for power." — Tarhos Kovács
Iridescent_Company_Banner.name: Iridescent Company Banner

Ironworker's_Tongs.description:
Vital for repairs between battles and a horrifying, gauging, tearing improvisational weapon.
  • If a Guard fails to damage a Survivor during a Hunt, the Survivor will suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for the next 20 seconds.
Ironworker's_Tongs.name: Ironworker's Tongs

Knight's_Contract.description:
The original document contracting Tarhos to Vittorio's employ.
The laws of man could not stand up, though, to natural law.
  • Every fourth Guard summoned causes Survivors within 12 metres of that Guard to suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 8 seconds.

"I fear he has left me here to die." — Vittorio Toscano
Knight's_Contract.name: Knight's Contract

Lightweight_Greaves.description:
Sometimes he wore lighter armour, letting him move faster; he knew nothing could stop him anyway.
  • After summoning The Jailer , Lightweight Greaves increases the Movement speed of The Knight by +10 % for the next 6 seconds.
Lightweight_Greaves.name: Lightweight Greaves

Map_of_the_Realm.description:
These unique leather maps were not easy to come by, but when they could not be purchased, they could be taken by force.
  • Increases the Vision range of Guards on Patrol by +4 metres.
Map_of_the_Realm.name: Map of the Realm

Pillaged_Mead.description:
Drinks taken from their victims tasted sweet, but such frivolities were often short-lived.
  • Reduces the Break or Damage Action duration of Guards by -15 %.
Pillaged_Mead.name: Pillaged Mead

Tattered_Tabard.description:
Cloaked in heavy fabrics, neither human nor nature could stop them once they had their target.
  • Increases the Patrol duration of Guards by +8 seconds.
Tattered_Tabard.name: Tattered Tabard

Town_Watch's_Torch.description:
Upon breaching a village, the first thing they would extinguish was the torches, and with them, hope.
  • If Guards fail to damage Survivors during a Hunt a total of two times, The Knight is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.
Town_Watch's_Torch.name: Town Watch's Torch

Treated_Blade.description:
Durkos Malecek, The Assassin, stuck to the shadows, and was an efficient slaughterer.
  • The Assassin appears twice in a row while cycling through Guardia Compagnia.
Treated_Blade.name: Treated Blade

BFFs.description:
An unnaturally cold silver necklace split into four, one for each best friend.

Hitting Survivors with chained Feral Slashes grants Tokens.
The more Feral Slashes are chained together, the higher the amount of awarded Tokens:

  • First Feral Slash: grants no Tokens
  • Second Feral Slash: +2 Tokens
  • Third Feral Slash: +3 Tokens
  • Fourth Feral Slash: +4 Tokens
  • Fifth Feral Slash: +5 Tokens

Once the Exit Gates are powered and only if 15 or more Tokens have been acquired, The Legion benefits from the following effect:

  • Grants a +6 % Haste Status Effect when not using Feral Frenzy.
BFFs.name: BFFs

Defaced_Smiley_Pin.description:
A once friendly looking, bright yellow button of a defaced smiley.
A signature icon of The Legion.
  • Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.
Defaced_Smiley_Pin.name: Defaced Smiley Pin

Etched_Ruler.description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
  • Survivors hit with a Feral Slash suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Etched_Ruler.name: Etched Ruler

Filthy_Blade.description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
  • Increases Mending time by +4 seconds.
Filthy_Blade.name: Filthy Blade

Frank's_Mix_Tape.description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes.
A track list of massive distortions and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.
  • Increases the Action speed of damaging Generators by +20 % and breaking Breakable Walls by +30 % during Feral Frenzy.
    • While performing these interactions, the Power Gauge is paused.
  • Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
    • Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.
Frank's_Mix_Tape.name: Frank's Mix Tape

Friendship_Bracelet.description:
A wide grey and red braided rope bracelet.
The inscription "F. J. S. J." can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
  • Extends the Lunge duration of Feral Slashes by +0.3 seconds.
Friendship_Bracelet.name: Friendship Bracelet

Fuming_Mix_Tape.description:
Dark beats, violent shreds and unfathomable vocals from another world fill the mind with a vibrating sixth sense.
  • The Repair Progression of Generators can be determined by the intensity of their Aura during Feral Frenzy.
    • Generators not being repaired start regressing.
  • Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
    • Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.
Fuming_Mix_Tape.name: Fuming Mix Tape

Iridescent_Button.description:
A glass-like button moulded from The Fog that captures The Legion's likeness.
The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
  • Feral Vaults immediately break the vaulted Pallet.

"The youth consumed by the iridescent glass magnifies and widens the reach of The Entity."
Iridescent_Button.name: Iridescent Button

Joey's_Mix_Tape.description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for chillaxin' when life's a bitch.
  • Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.
  • Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
    • Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.
Joey's_Mix_Tape.name: Joey's Mix Tape

Julie's_Mix_Tape.description:
A dark and depressing mix tape made out from mainly power ballads and gloomy melodies.
  • Refills the Power Gauge when getting stunned by any means in Feral Frenzy.
  • Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
    • Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.
Julie's_Mix_Tape.name: Julie's Mix Tape

Mischief_List.description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish, memento of brighter days.
  • Extends Feral Frenzy by +2 seconds.
Mischief_List.name: Mischief List

Mural_Sketch.description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
  • Increases the stack-able Movement Speed boost from successful Feral Slashes to +0.3 m/s, up to a maximum of +1.2 m/s.
Mural_Sketch.name: Mural Sketch

Never-Sleep_Pills.description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or draining activities.
  • Reduces the base Movement speed of Feral Frenzy to 4.6 m/s.
  • Increases the duration of Feral Frenzy by +10 seconds.
  • Grants a stack-able additional +100 Bloodpoints for successful Feral Slashes, up to a maximum of +500 Bloodpoints.
Never-Sleep_Pills.name: Never-Sleep Pills

Scratched_Ruler.description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
  • Reduces Power Recovery time by -5 seconds.
Scratched_Ruler.name: Scratched Ruler

Smiley_Face_Pin.description:
A friendly looking, bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.
  • Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Smiley_Face_Pin.name: Smiley Face Pin

Stab_Wounds_Study.description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library, vulgarising a study on lesions and stab wounds.
  • Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion have their Aura revealed for 4 seconds.
Stab_Wounds_Study.name: Stab Wounds Study

Stolen_Sketch_Book.description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre sketches.
  • From the second Feral Slash onwards, Survivors drop their Items when hit.
Stolen_Sketch_Book.name: Stolen Sketch Book

Stylish_Sunglasses.description:
Oval-shaped sunglasses that exude poise and cool.
Their colour-tinted lenses add an understated appeal.
  • Survivors Mending within 24 metres of your location have their Auras revealed to you.
Stylish_Sunglasses.name: Stylish Sunglasses

Susie's_Mix_Tape.description:
A fast and thrilling mix tape with energising songs with break-neck beats.
  • Extends the Killer Instinct Detection radius by +20 metres.
  • Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
    • Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.
Susie's_Mix_Tape.name: Susie's Mix Tape

The_Legion_Pin.description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion.
To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
  • Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds.
The_Legion_Pin.name: The Legion Pin

Bullhorn.description:
The commands screamed into this device riled up some and disoriented others.
  • Survivors using the First Aid Spray suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 30 seconds.
Bullhorn.name: Bullhorn

Chalice_(Gold).description:
A chalice of pure gold used to celebrate the summer solstice.
  • Increases the remaining Bound duration when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by +50 %.
Chalice_(Gold).name: Chalice (Gold)

Dark_Sunglasses.description:
Glasses enhanced with AR that grant the wearer an invaluable advantage on the battlefield.
  • When a Survivor becomes Critically Infected, gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.
Dark_Sunglasses.name: Dark Sunglasses

Egg_(Gold).description:
A highly coveted foodstuff.
The cash worth is second only to its regenerative effects.
  • Increases the duration of the additional Virulent Bound Window by +50 %.
Egg_(Gold).name: Egg (Gold)

Green_Herb.description:
A common plant, usually known for its restorative properties.
  • Increases the Infection Gain when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by 30 %.
Green_Herb.name: Green Herb

Helicopter_Stick.description:
Debris from a helicopter crash.
Few jobs are more dangerous than a helicopter pilot’s when Wesker is involved.
  • When a Survivor uses a First Aid Spray, reveal their Aura for 8 seconds.
Helicopter_Stick.name: Helicopter Stick

Iridescent_Uroboros_Vial.description:
The perfect bio-weapon.
Decades of research have led to this.
  • Survivors start the Trial Infected with Uroboros.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 30 seconds when becoming Critically Infected.

"The entire world will be infected. A new Genesis is at hand and I will be the creator!" — Albert Wesker
Iridescent_Uroboros_Vial.name: Iridescent Uroboros Vial

Jewel_Beetle.description:
A beautiful and valuable insect.
While difficult to capture, it is worth a pretty penny.
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Virulent Bound Score Events.
  • Reduces the remaining Bound duration when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by -50 %.
Jewel_Beetle.name: Jewel Beetle

Lab_Photo.description:
Wesker was as much a researcher as he was a guinea pig for Umbrella's bio-weapons.
  • Destroy Pallets and Breakable Walls when colliding while using Virulent Bound.
  • Removes the ability to vault Pallets while using Virulent Bound.

"Only a handful of humans truly matter. Everyone else is just so much chaff. So now I have to separate this chaff from the wheat." — Albert Wesker
Lab_Photo.name: Lab Photo

Leather_Gloves.description:
Gloves of a cold, calculating schemer.
They impart an air of icy professionalism.
  • Reduces the Power Recharge time by -10 %.
Leather_Gloves.name: Leather Gloves

Lion_Medallion.description:
An old medallion depicting a brave lion.
It was made when the Raccoon Police Station was still an art museum.
  • Increases the Throw distance of grabbed Survivors by +30 %.
Lion_Medallion.name: Lion Medallion

Loose_Crank.description:
To the person whose only tool is a crank, the whole world looks like a crank-shaped hole.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Mastermind during the Chain Bound Window by +8 %.
Loose_Crank.name: Loose Crank

Maiden_Medallion.description:
A medallion depicting a beautiful maiden.
Its purpose was unknown for many years.
  • When a Survivor becomes Critically Infected, they suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Maiden_Medallion.name: Maiden Medallion

Portable_Safe.description:
A small container that requires a complicated combination to unlock.
  • Survivors injured by Virulent Bound suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.
Portable_Safe.name: Portable Safe

R.P.D._Shoulder_Walkie.description:
Without the ability to communicate, the cops of Raccoon City are isolated and don’t stand a chance.
  • Reduces the duration of the First Bound by -20 %.
  • Extends the duration of the Second Bound by +20 %.
R.P.D._Shoulder_Walkie.name: R.P.D. Shoulder Walkie

Red_Herb.description:
Acts as a reagent that strengthens the effect of that with which it is combined.
  • Increases the Interaction time of the First Aid Spray by +2 seconds.
Red_Herb.name: Red Herb

Unicorn_Medallion.description:
An old medallion depicting a majestic unicorn.
It was placed in storage for years.
  • Extends the duration of the First Bound by +20 %.
  • Reduces the duration of the Second Bound by -20 %.
Unicorn_Medallion.name: Unicorn Medallion

Uroboros_Tendril.description:
The result of decades of Bio Organic Weapon research.
It will not rest until it has swallowed the entire world.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Mastermind while charging Virulent Bound by +5 %.
Uroboros_Tendril.name: Uroboros Tendril

Uroboros_Virus.description:
For some, the strength and resistance was worth the trade-off.
  • When a Survivor becomes Critically Infected, reveal their Aura for 4 seconds.

"The balance of the world is changing… and you're completely oblivious to it." — Ricardo Irving
Uroboros_Virus.name: Uroboros Virus

Video_Conference_Device.description:
Many intricate conspiracies were orchestrated on devices just like this one.
  • Reduces the time for Survivors passively becoming Infected by -30 %.
Video_Conference_Device.name: Video Conference Device

Admin_Wristband.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility.
While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases the Survivor Detection range of Zombies by +4 metres.
  • Increases the Field of View of Zombies by +17.5 °.
Admin_Wristband.name: Admin Wristband

Adrenaline_Injector.description:
A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration after a Survivors uses a Vaccine by +3 seconds.
Adrenaline_Injector.name: Adrenaline Injector

Brian's_Intestine.description:
The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD.
It is an appetising sight for zombies.
  • Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.25 m/s.
Brian's_Intestine.name: Brian's Intestine

Broken_Recovery_Coin.description:
A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath.
It is broken in half.
  • Removes 1 Supply Case from the Trial.

"This is not how I imagined my first day." — Leon Scott Kennedy
Broken_Recovery_Coin.name: Broken Recovery Coin

Damaged_Syringe.description:
Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.
  • Increases Vaccine Injection time for Survivors by +5 seconds.
Damaged_Syringe.name: Damaged Syringe

Depleted_Ink_Ribbon.description:
Who will save them now? There is something about this ink ribbon being dry that energises zombies.
  • Reduces Zombie Respawn time by -5 seconds.
  • Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.5 m/s.
  • Once all 5 Generators are completed, any destroyed Zombies respawn in an Exit Gate area.

"Look, just so you know... this is the last fucking time." — Jill Valentine
Depleted_Ink_Ribbon.name: Depleted Ink Ribbon

Iridescent_Umbrella_Badge.description:
A glass-like badge moulded from The Fog itself.
It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.
  • After using a Vaccine, Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds.

"Commitment, honesty, integrity. These are the core values that create the foundation of Umbrella Corp." — Dr Matt Gorkis'
Iridescent_Umbrella_Badge.name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge

Jill's_Sandwich.description:
It is tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle.
Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that cannot be missed.
  • After a Survivor unlocks a Supply Case, their Aura is revealed to The Nemesis for 12 seconds.
Jill's_Sandwich.name: Jill's Sandwich

Licker_Tongue.description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.
  • Increases Hindered Status Effect duration after becoming Contaminated by +0.2 seconds.

It's like... a nightmare." — Claire Redfield
Licker_Tongue.name: Licker Tongue

Marvin's_Blood.description:
The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City Police Officer.
  • Increases the Mutation Rate when hitting Survivors with a Tentacle Strike by +0.75 Mutation Points.

"All you need to know is that this place will eat you alive if you’re not careful." — Marvin Branagh
Marvin's_Blood.name: Marvin's Blood

Mikhail's_Eye.description:
While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him.
It remains a tasty treat for zombies.
  • Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.35 m/s.
Mikhail's_Eye.name: Mikhail's Eye

NE-a_Parasite.description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it is capable of hijacking its host's brain.
  • When becoming Contaminated, Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds or until they cure themselves with a Vaccine.
NE-a_Parasite.name: NE-a Parasite

Plant_43_Vines.description:
The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.
  • Increases Supply Case Opening time for Survivors by +4 seconds.
Plant_43_Vines.name: Plant 43 Vines

S.T.A.R.S._Field_Combat_Manual.description:
A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge, edited by Chris Redfield.
  • After Zombies hit a Survivor, their Aura turns yellow for 6 seconds.
S.T.A.R.S._Field_Combat_Manual.name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual

Serotonin_Injector.description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.
  • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds, when a Zombie is destroyed.
Serotonin_Injector.name: Serotonin Injector

Shattered_S.T.A.R.S._Badge.description:
A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.
  • Increases Zombie Movement speed by +1.5 m/s for 60 seconds whenever a Generator is completed.

"S.T.A.R.S..." — Nemesis'
Shattered_S.T.A.R.S._Badge.name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge

T-Virus_Sample.description:
A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.
  • Increases the Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +1 Contamination Point.
T-Virus_Sample.name: T-Virus Sample

Tyrant_Gore.description:
A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat.
There are signs of severe burns.
  • Increases the Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +0.75 Contamination Points.
  • Reduces Zombie Respawn time by -7.5 seconds.
Tyrant_Gore.name: Tyrant Gore

Visitor_Wristband.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility.
It also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases the Survivor Detection range of Zombies by +2 metres.
  • Increases the Field of View of Zombies by +10 °.
Visitor_Wristband.name: Visitor Wristband

Zombie_Heart.description:
The heart of an eviscerated zombie.
It is considered hazardous waste as it is certainly teeming with viruses.
  • Increases the Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +0.75 Contamination Points.

"Words won't work on this thing." — Leon Scott Kennedy
Zombie_Heart.name: Zombie Heart

\"Z\"_Block.description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which's only recognisable feature is the letter "Z".
  • Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 90 seconds.
  • Healthy Survivors will leave Pools of Blood as if they were injured.
\"Z\"_Block.name: "Z" Block

Black_Box.description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

  • Recently opened Exit Gates are blocked for 15 seconds.
Black_Box.name: Black Box

Blue_Dress.description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which's front is ruined by large cuts.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

  • Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by +4 %.
  • The Auras of Survivors failing these Skill Checks are revealed for 4 seconds.
Blue_Dress.name: Blue Dress

Cat_Block.description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping Cat and the letter "C".
  • Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Cat_Block.name: Cat Block

Class_Photo.description:
A large photograph taken at Badham Preschool showing the cheerful class of '94-95.
  • Causes every Generator to spew blood while channelling Dream Projection and suppresses the Husk.
  • The Nightmare is unable to cancel Dream Projection once initiated.
Class_Photo.name: Class Photo

Garden_Rake.description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
Garden_Rake.name: Garden Rake

Green_Dress.description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

  • Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by +4 %.
  • The Auras of Survivors failing these Skill Checks are revealed for 3 seconds.
Green_Dress.name: Green Dress

Jump_Rope_(Dream_Demon).description:
A long Double-Dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.
  • Increases the volume of Survivors' Grunts of Pain by +50 %, if they are the Dream World.
Jump_Rope_(Dream_Demon).name: Jump Rope (Dream Demon)

Kid's_Drawing.description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
  • Gain an extra 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category when a Survivor triggers a Dream Snare.
  • Reduces the Movement Speed penalty of triggered Dream Snares by -10 %.
Kid's_Drawing.name: Kid's Drawing

Nancy's_Masterpiece.description:
A painting of a Character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasure memory.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by -3 % for each Survivor inside the Dream World.
Nancy's_Masterpiece.name: Nancy's Masterpiece

Nancy's_Sketch.description:
A crude and bold sketch made with Fusain, signed by Nancy H.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by -2 % for each Survivor inside the Dream World.
Nancy's_Sketch.name: Nancy's Sketch

Outdoor_Rope.description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

  • Increases the audible range of Generator-Repair noises by +8 metres.
Outdoor_Rope.name: Outdoor Rope

Paint_Thinner.description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
  • The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed for 6 seconds.
Paint_Thinner.name: Paint Thinner

Pill_Bottle.description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called "Zoneral".
  • Reduces the Distance range at which awake Survivors see The Nightmare intermittently to 12 to 24 metres.
  • The Nightmare is invisible to awake Survivors beyond 24 metres and when he is carrying another Survivor.
Pill_Bottle.name: Pill Bottle

Prototype_Claws.description:
A home-made tool to facilitate bush trimming.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
  • The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed for 4 seconds.
Prototype_Claws.name: Prototype Claws

Red_Paint_Brush.description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
  • Causes all Survivors to start the Trial inside the Dream World.
  • Survivors are unable to wake themselves up by failing Skill Checks.
Red_Paint_Brush.name: Red Paint Brush

Sheep_Block.description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two woolly Lambs grazing and the letter "S".
  • Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Sheep_Block.name: Sheep Block

Swing_Chains.description:
Rusty, but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

  • The Footstep noises of Survivors are 50 % louder.
Swing_Chains.name: Swing Chains

Unicorn_Block.description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing Unicorn and the letter "U".
  • Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 90 seconds.
Unicorn_Block.name: Unicorn Block

Wool_Shirt.description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

  • Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by +4 %.
Wool_Shirt.name: Wool Shirt

\"Bad_Man's\"_Last_Breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient known as the "Bad Man".
In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.
  • Hitting Survivors with a Special Attack grants the Undetectable Status Effect for the next 25 seconds.

"Bad Man's" Last Breath has a cool-down of 45 seconds.
\"Bad_Man's\"_Last_Breath.name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath

Anxious_Gasp.description:
The gasp of surprise collected from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl", which The Nurse was fond of.
Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
  • Coming within 1 metre of Survivors while teleporting causes them to scream and reveal their location.
  • Grants 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Anxious_Gasp.name: Anxious Gasp

Ataxic_Respiration.description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the asylum patient known as the "Catatonic Boy".
Normally stable and calm, it becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
  • Reduces the duration of Fatigue by -7 %.
Ataxic_Respiration.name: Ataxic Respiration

Bad_Man_Keepsake.description:
A rotten molar ripped from the "Bad Man's" cold dead hand.
  • Survivors hit with a Special Attack have their Auras revealed to The Nurse if they are healing or being healed within 28 metres of her location for the next 60 seconds.
Bad_Man_Keepsake.name: Bad Man Keepsake

Campbell's_Last_Breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum priest Father Campbell.
In the hand of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
  • Reappearing from a fully charged Blink, The Nurse will automatically Blink at full charge in the direction she is facing.
    • This requires that The Nurse has at least 1 Charge left after the initial Blink.
Campbell's_Last_Breath.name: Campbell's Last Breath

Catatonic_Boy's_Treasure.description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement.
Taken from the "Catatonic Boy's" body.
  • Reduces the additional Fatigue penalty applied by Chain Blinks by -65 %.
Catatonic_Boy's_Treasure.name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure

Dark_Cincture.description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning.
Taken from Father Campbell's body.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse during the Chain Blink Window by +30 %.
Dark_Cincture.name: Dark Cincture

Dull_Bracelet.description:
A worthless piece of jewellery that might have an important significance to someone.
Taken from the "Anxious Girl's" body.
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Precise Blink Score Events.
  • Reduces the maximum range of the Blink by -20 %.
Dull_Bracelet.name: Dull Bracelet

Fragile_Wheeze.description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell.
Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
  • Survivors hit with a Special Attack suffer from the Mangled Status Effect.
Fragile_Wheeze.name: Fragile Wheeze

Heavy_Panting.description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from Harvey Kavanagh, the asylum's "Fat Orderly".
Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
  • Extends the Lunge duration of Special Attacks to 130 %, increasing the Attack reach of The Nurse's reach by +30 %.
    • This effect only applies after the second or third Blink.
Heavy_Panting.name: Heavy Panting

Jenner's_Last_Breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl".
In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
  • After exhausting all her Blinks, but before succumbing to Fatigue, press the Active Ability button to cause The Nurse to immediately Blink back to her original position.
  • Recharges her Power by +1 Charge.
Jenner's_Last_Breath.name: Jenner's Last Breath

Kavanagh's_Last_Breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum orderly Harvey Kavanagh, also known as the "Fat Orderly".
In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
  • When succumbing to Fatigue, all Survivors within 8 metres of The Nurse suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Kavanagh's_Last_Breath.name: Kavanagh's Last Breath

Matchbox.description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons.
Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse to 4.4 m/s for the entire Trial.
  • Restricts the Power of The Nurse to 1 Blink.
    • This cannot be altered by other Add-ons.
Matchbox.name: Matchbox

Metal_Spoon.description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon.
Confiscated from Room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
  • Survivors hit by a Special Attack have the volume of their Grunts of Pain increased by +50 % for the next 60 seconds.
Metal_Spoon.name: Metal Spoon

Plaid_Flannel.description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel.
The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
  • Unlocks the ability to see the Landing zone of the Blink.
Plaid_Flannel.name: Plaid Flannel

Pocket_Watch.description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces.
Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
  • Increases the duration of the Chain Blink Window by +0.2 seconds.
Pocket_Watch.name: Pocket Watch

Spasmodic_Breath.description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man".
Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.

Hitting a Survivor with a Special Attack causes the following effects for the next 60 seconds:

  • Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse to 4.6 m/s.
  • Disables Spencer's Last Breath.
Spasmodic_Breath.name: Spasmodic Breath

Torn_Bookmark.description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book.
Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
  • Increases the number of available Power Tokens by +1.
  • Extends the Power Recharge duration to 130 %.
Torn_Bookmark.name: Torn Bookmark

White_Nit_Comb.description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic.
Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Blink Attack Score Events.
  • Reduces the Lunge duration of Special Attacks by -0.15 seconds, reducing the Attack reach of The Nurse's reach by -50 %.
White_Nit_Comb.name: White Nit Comb

Wooden_Horse.description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse.
Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
  • Reduces the additional Fatigue penalty applied by missed Special Attacks by -0.5 seconds.
Wooden_Horse.name: Wooden Horse

Akito's_Crutch.description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree.
Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.
  • Increases The Oni's Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +1.0 m/s.
Akito's_Crutch.name: Akito's Crutch

Blackened_Toenail.description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple.
Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.
  • Increases The Oni's Movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by +0.4 m/s.

"If a father sacrifices not for his children, then who does he father?" — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:12
Blackened_Toenail.name: Blackened Toenail

Bloody_Sash.description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan "The Noble Impostor".
Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often revelling at the sash in secret.
  • Increases' The Oni's Movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by +0.7 m/s.
Bloody_Sash.name: Bloody Sash

Child's_Wooden_Sword.description:
Akito's practice sword.
The child had little use for it after his injury.
  • Increases the Aura Detection range of Blood Orbs by +3 metres.
Child's_Wooden_Sword.name: Child's Wooden Sword

Chipped_Saihai.description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro.
It was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.
  • Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +6 seconds.
Chipped_Saihai.name: Chipped Saihai

Cracked_Sakazuki.description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony.
It never made it through the night before being damaged.
  • Reduces the Activation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Deactivation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Cracked_Sakazuki.name: Cracked Sakazuki

Ink_Lion.description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka Estate.
Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.
  • Reduces the Activation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Deactivation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Duration penalty of Blood Fury when downing a Survivor by -2 seconds.
Ink_Lion.name: Ink Lion

Iridescent_Family_Crest.description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.
  • Hitting the ground with a missed Demon Strike will cause all Survivors within 24 metres of your location to scream and reveal their location to you.

"Know who you are so you may shield your heart." — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:2
Iridescent_Family_Crest.name: Iridescent Family Crest

Kanai-Anzen_Talisman.description:
A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.
  • Increases The Oni's Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +0.64 m/s.
Kanai-Anzen_Talisman.name: Kanai-Anzen Talisman

Lion_Fang.description:
A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolises power and nobility.
  • Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +10 seconds.
Lion_Fang.name: Lion Fang

Paper_Lantern.description:
Perhaps a memento of simpler times, before rage fully enveloped him.
  • Increases the Movement speed of Blood Orbs while attracted to The Oni by +4 m/s.
Paper_Lantern.name: Paper Lantern

Polished_Maedate.description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.
  • Increases the Passive Power Charge rate by +0.1 c/s.
Polished_Maedate.name: Polished Maedate

Renjiro's_Bloody_Glove.description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son Kazan.
  • Blood Orbs are visible to Survivors.
  • A Survivor coming into contact with a Blood Orb absorbs it, but has their Aura revealed to you for 2 seconds.
    • This effect stacks for each absorbed Blood Orb.

"When all else spills out, cling only to your honour." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:12
Renjiro's_Bloody_Glove.name: Renjiro's Bloody Glove

Rotting_Rope.description:
Had the rope been stronger it would have likely held Kazan.
As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.
  • Increases the Aura Detection range of Blood Orbs by +2 metres.

"Though Death is focused, he has been known to blink." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:5
Rotting_Rope.name: Rotting Rope

Scalped_Topknot.description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honour.
The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.
  • Reduces the Activation time of a Demon Dash by -0.5 seconds.
Scalped_Topknot.name: Scalped Topknot

Shattered_Wakizashi.description:
The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.
  • Increases the Passive Power Charge rate by +0.2 c/s.
Shattered_Wakizashi.name: Shattered Wakizashi

Splintered_Hull.description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka.
Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.
  • Increases the Frequency of Survivors dropping Blood Orbs by +33 %.
  • Survivors drop 1 additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw Pallets, exit Lockers, crouch, or fail a Skill Check.

"To plan subterfuge, begin with a counsel of none." — Renjiro's Doctrine 7:9
Splintered_Hull.name: Splintered Hull

Tear_Soaked_Tenugui.description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.
  • Reduces the Duration penalty of Blood Fury when downing a Survivor by -4 seconds.
Tear_Soaked_Tenugui.name: Tear Soaked Tenugui

Wooden_Oni_Mask.description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.
  • Increases the Frequency of Survivors dropping Blood Orbs by +14 %.
  • Survivors drop 1 additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw Pallets, exit Lockers, crouch, or fail a Skill Check.

"It is no coincidence that man is so familiar with demons." — Renjiro's Doctrine 3:8
Wooden_Oni_Mask.name: Wooden Oni Mask

Yamaoka_Sashimono.description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.
  • Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +8 seconds.
Yamaoka_Sashimono.name: Yamaoka Sashimono

Bloody_Fingernails.description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well.
Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
  • Increases the duration of the Post-Projection Movement Speed boost by +50 %.
Bloody_Fingernails.name: Bloody Fingernails

Cabin_Sign.description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape.
Carries the memory of those first curses.
  • Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after Projection by -4.5 seconds.
Cabin_Sign.name: Cabin Sign

Clump_of_Hair.description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
  • Reduces the range at which The Onryō is visible while Demanifested by -6 metres.
Clump_of_Hair.name: Clump of Hair

Distorted_Photo.description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of themselves distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.
  • Survivors witnessing The Onryō Manifest within 16 metres of them scream, revealing their Aura for 4 seconds.

"Why is it only you were saved?" — Sadako Yamamura
Distorted_Photo.name: Distorted Photo

Iridescent_Videotape.description:
The original tape containing Sadako's curse.
  • Survivors who take a VHS Tape must bring it to a specific TV.
  • Only the selected TV's Aura is shown to a Survivor holding a VHS Tape.

"That video... It's not of this world. It's Sadako's rage." — Ryuji Takayama
Iridescent_Videotape.name: Iridescent Videotape

Mother's_Comb.description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape.
Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
  • Reveals the Aura of any TV being turned off in yellow.
  • Survivors turning off a TV trigger a Loud Noise Notification
Mother's_Comb.name: Mother's Comb

Mother's_Mirror.description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house.
A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
  • Increases the duration of the intermittent visibility phase after Manifesting by +2 seconds.
Mother's_Mirror.name: Mother's Mirror

Old_Newspaper.description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
  • Increases the invisibility duration after Manifesting by +33 %.
Old_Newspaper.name: Old Newspaper

Reiko's_Watch.description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi.
A distracting and constant reminder of one's impending doom.
  • Increases the invisibility duration while Demanifested by +33 %.
Reiko's_Watch.name: Reiko's Watch

Remote_Control.description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin.
It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.
  • After using Projection, the Auras of Survivors, who are within 12 metres of a powered TV are revealed to you for 7 seconds.

"She killed a man just by willing him dead. That's power of a different order from her mother." — Ryuji Takayama
Remote_Control.name: Remote Control

Rickety_Pinwheel.description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima.
It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
  • Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
    • This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.
Rickety_Pinwheel.name: Rickety Pinwheel

Ring_Drawing.description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi.
Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
  • Condemned Survivors spread their Condemnation to other Survivors, who complete a Healing action on an Injured Survivor.
Ring_Drawing.name: Ring Drawing

Sea-Soaked_Cloth.description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape.
Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
  • Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
    • This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.
Sea-Soaked_Cloth.name: Sea-Soaked Cloth

Tape_Editing_Deck.description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyse and copy the tape.
Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
  • Each Survivor starts the Trial with a VHS Tape in their possession, and their highlighted TV is the one farthest from their location.

"Frolic in brine, goblins be thine." — Message hidden in Sadako's tape
Tape_Editing_Deck.name: Tape Editing Deck

Telephone.description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call.
They are frozen in fear as they realise they have seven days left to live.
  • Manifesting within 7 metres of a Survivor afflicts them with the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds.

"I saw a weird video the other day... after it ended, someone called us. Some kind of prank call." — Tomoko Oishi
Telephone.name: Telephone

VCR.description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's tape.
It is still warm to the touch.
  • All TVs play the Projection effects when The Onryō Projects to a TV.
VCR.name: VCR

Videotape_Copy.description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako.
It dampens the desire for vengeance.
  • Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after Projection by -10 seconds.
  • Reduces the amount of Condemned inflicted by Projection by +0.5 Stacks.
Videotape_Copy.name: Videotape Copy

Well_Stone.description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
  • Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after having been turned off by a Survivor by -7 seconds.
Well_Stone.name: Well Stone

Well_Water.description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die.
Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +2 seconds when Manifesting by any means.
Well_Water.name: Well Water

Yoichi's_Fishing_Net.description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather.
A reminder that death comes to us all.
  • Survivors with at least 4 Stacks of Condemned suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
Yoichi's_Fishing_Net.name: Yoichi's Fishing Net

Amanda's_Letter.description:
A blackmailing Letter for the attention of Amanda.
Fills the reader with rage and focus.
  • When crouched, the Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres are revealed to you.
  • Reduces available Reverse Bear Traps by -2 Traps.

"Amanda, you were with Cecil the night Jill lost Gideon. You killed their child. You know it and I know it." — Amanda's Letter
Amanda's_Letter.name: Amanda's Letter

Amanda's_Secret.description:
A black metal box containing a knife and various medical supplies, such as bandages and compresses.
Deep cuts reduce stress and awaken the senses.
  • Survivors removing their Reverse Bear Trap trigger a Loud Noise Notification
  • Survivors removing their Reverse Bear Trap have their Aura revealed to you for 6 seconds.
  • Disables your ability to see the Auras of Jigsaw Boxes.
Amanda's_Secret.name: Amanda's Secret

Bag_of_Gears.description:
A few mechanical parts that allow the creation of challenging Jigsaw Boxes and easier to install Reverse Bear Traps.
  • Increases the Attaching speed of Reverse Bear Traps by +50 %.
  • Decreases the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by -14 %.
Bag_of_Gears.name: Bag of Gears

Combat_Straps.description:
Leather straps that hold fabric in place for nimbler movement.
  • Increases the Crouch State Transitioning speed by +30 %.
Combat_Straps.name: Combat Straps

Crate_of_Gears.description:
This collection of mechanical parts allows the creation of extra-challenging Jigsaw Boxes and Reverse Bear Traps that are easier to install.
  • Increases the Attaching speed of Reverse Bear Traps by +50 %.
  • Decreases the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by -25 %.
Crate_of_Gears.name: Crate of Gears

Face_Mask.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
The heavy cloth face mask, laced with a sedative, partially suffocates the target, making it hard to concentrate.
  • Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Traps suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.

Face Mask does not hide the Auras of the Jigsaw Boxes.
Face_Mask.name: Face Mask

Interlocking_Razor.description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box:
The addition of interlocking razor blades makes it impossible to move suddenly in the Jigsaw Box without slitting one's wrists.
  • Failing a Skill Check at Jigsaw Boxes will apply Deep Wound Status Effect to Injured Survivors.
Interlocking_Razor.name: Interlocking Razor

Jigsaw's_Annotated_Plan.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design laid down on paper and annotated by Jigsaw.
  • Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by +1 Trap.
  • Each time a Generator is completed, the Death Timer of all active Reverse Bear Traps is reduced by -10 seconds.
  • Increases the default Death Timer duration by +10 seconds.
Jigsaw's_Annotated_Plan.name: Jigsaw's Annotated Plan

Jigsaw's_Sketch.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design sketched in detail on a sheet of paper.
  • Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by +1 Trap.
  • Whenever a Survivor wearing a Reverse Bear Trap is repairing a Generator that Generator's Aura is highlighted to you.
Jigsaw's_Sketch.name: Jigsaw's Sketch

John's_Medical_File.description:
The medical file of a cancerous man.
Fills the reader with dread and recklessness.
  • Increases Crouch Movement speed by +10 %.
John's_Medical_File.name: John's Medical File

Last_Will.description:
A latched wooden box with a satin lining, offered as part of a last will.
  • Increases Movement speed during an Ambush Dash by +6 %.
  • Increases the Charge time of Ambush Dash by +33 %.
Last_Will.name: Last Will

Razor_Wires.description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box:
The addition of razor sharp wires makes it extra difficult and potentially painful to search them.
  • Failing a Skill Check at Jigsaw Boxes will injure Healthy Survivors.
  • Increases the difficulty of Skill Checks by +20 %.
Razor_Wires.name: Razor Wires

Rules_Set_No.2.description:
Not all games need to have the same rules.
  • Disables the Survivors' ability to see the Auras of Jigsaw Boxes until their Reverse Bear Trap is activated.

"Listen, there are rules." — Jigsaw
Rules_Set_No.2.name: Rules Set No.2

Rusty_Attachments.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
Mouth spikes, covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Injured Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.
Rusty_Attachments.name: Rusty Attachments

Shattered_Syringe.description:
Symbol of a broken way of life.
Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by -25 %.
Shattered_Syringe.name: Shattered Syringe

Slow-Release_Toxin.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
A poison that is not fatal, but weakens the body and makes it nearly impossible to recover fully from any effort.
  • Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.
Slow-Release_Toxin.name: Slow-Release Toxin

Tampered_Timer.description:
A timer that has been fiddled with.
A spring in the mechanism forces the gears to turn faster.
  • Reduces the default Death Timer duration of Reverse Bear Trap by -20 seconds.
Tampered_Timer.name: Tampered Timer

Utility_Blades.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
Sharp blades attached to the Trap's interior lacerate the victim with every movement.
  • Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect.
Utility_Blades.name: Utility Blades

Video_Tape.description:
A recording of Jigsaw, explaining the game's rules to Amanda.
Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • All Survivors start the Trial with Reverse Bear Traps installed.
Video_Tape.name: Video Tape

Workshop_Grease.description:
A simple tube of grease, used to lubricate the mechanisms of the hidden blade.
  • Increases the Charge speed of the Ambush Dash by +50 %.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by -25 %.
Workshop_Grease.name: Workshop Grease

Ashen_Apple.description:
A peeled apple rolled into sanctified ashes.
Eating such a fruit warded off the malignantly envious spirits of the deceased.
  • Start the Trial with 1 Pool of Devotion already corrupted.
  • Increases available Pools of Devotion by +1.
Ashen_Apple.name: Ashen Apple

Black_Incense.description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings.
The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.
  • The Auras of infected Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds when they vomit.
Black_Incense.name: Black Incense

Blessed_Apple.description:
A perfectly ripe fruit to break fast during the purification ceremony.
Delicious.
  • Start the Trial with 1 Pool of Devotion already corrupted.
Blessed_Apple.name: Blessed Apple

Devotee's_Amulet.description:
A blood stone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian God of Mayhem and Pestilence.
Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.
  • Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by +20 seconds.
Devotee's_Amulet.name: Devotee's Amulet

Emetic_Potion.description:
A mustard-water based syrup that induces vomiting when consumed.
Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases effectiveness of Vile Purge by +30 %.
Emetic_Potion.name: Emetic Potion

Exorcism_Amulet.description:
An obsidian amulet to ward off sickness during exorcism rituals. Inscribed with a prayer to the God of Mayhem and Pestilence.
Fills the wearer with fierce devotion.
  • Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by +10 seconds.
Exorcism_Amulet.name: Exorcism Amulet

Haematite_Seal.description:
A cylindrical seal forged from a metallic hard-stone, engraved with bird-headed beings that stood next to strange machines.
Used as a container for sanctified ashes.
  • Increases Object Infection duration by +30 seconds.
Haematite_Seal.name: Haematite Seal

Healing_Salve.description:
A bitterly pungent paste of crushed roots, which were marinated in fish brine for three days and in wine for two.
Applied on skin rashes.
  • Reduces Cool-down time of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.25 seconds.
Healing_Salve.name: Healing Salve

Incensed_Ointment.description:
A dark waxy paste, laced with cedar sap that diffuses a sweet and earthy aroma.
Applied directly on infected skin.
  • Ingesting Corruption causes all Survivors within The Plague's Terror Radius to scream and reveal their locations.
Incensed_Ointment.name: Incensed Ointment

Infected_Emetic.description:
A disgusting syrup of unknown origin.
The thick yellow liquid is consumed to induce vomiting.
Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases effectiveness of Vile Purge by +40 %.
Infected_Emetic.name: Infected Emetic

Iridescent_Seal.description:
A translucent cylindrical seal moulded from The Fog itself with the effigy of The Plague.
Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.
  • Each time a Generator is completed, The Plague is automatically granted Corrupt Purge.
  • Reduces duration of Corrupt Purge by -20 seconds.
Iridescent_Seal.name: Iridescent Seal

Limestone_Seal.description:
A cylindrical seal made from porous stone that displays a ritualistic scene with winged deities.
  • Increases Object Infection duration by +20 seconds.
Limestone_Seal.name: Limestone Seal

Olibanum_Incense.description:
Precious resin extracted from Boswellia trees, used during ceremonies for their sweet citrusy fragrance.
  • The Auras of Survivors cleansing at Pools of Devotion are revealed for 4 seconds.
Olibanum_Incense.name: Olibanum Incense

Potent_Tincture.description:
A frothing, murky liquid that permeates the air with an acute aroma of herbs and alcohol. Applied directly on blisters.
  • Reduces Cool-down time of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.4 seconds.
Potent_Tincture.name: Potent Tincture

Prayer_Tablet_Fragment.description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
  • Increases Object Infection duration by +40 seconds.
  • Increases Infection gained from infected Objects by +100 %.
  • Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
  • Vile Purge no longer affects Survivors directly.
Prayer_Tablet_Fragment.name: Prayer Tablet Fragment

Prophylactic_Amulet.description:
A soapstone amulet crudely engraved with a winged deity that wards off sickness.
Fills the wearer with devotion.
  • Decreases available Pools of Devotion by -2.
Prophylactic_Amulet.name: Prophylactic Amulet

Rubbing_Oil.description:
A beaker of rubbing oil with expectorant quality.
Exudes the evergreen scent of laurel and rosemary.
  • Increases Charge rate of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +50 %.
Rubbing_Oil.name: Rubbing Oil

Severed_Toe.description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck.
Radiates with vile power.
  • Increases Infection gained from interacting with Objects by +50 %.
Severed_Toe.name: Severed Toe

Vile_Emetic.description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients.
Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting.
Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases Projectile speed of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +10 %.
Vile_Emetic.name: Vile Emetic

Worship_Tablet.description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold, showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.
  • Increases Ingestion speed by +100 %.
  • Increases Movement speed while holding Corrupt Purge by +4.4 %.
Worship_Tablet.name: Worship Tablet

Blond_Hair.description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +10 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).
Blond_Hair.name: Blond Hair

Boyfriend's_Memo.description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
  • Increases the range of The Shape's Lunge Attack by +50 % (open time: +0.1 seconds) while in Evil Within I.

"The note is signed: D."
Boyfriend's_Memo.name: Boyfriend's Memo

Dead_Rabbit.description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
  • Reduces The Shape's Terror Radius by -25 % while in Evil Within II.
  • Increases The Shape's Terror Radius by +25 % while in Evil Within III.
Dead_Rabbit.name: Dead Rabbit

Fragrant_Tuft_of_Hair.description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp.
Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
  • Grants unlimited duration to Evil Within III.
  • Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +200 % (+10 Stalk points).
Fragrant_Tuft_of_Hair.name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair

Glass_Fragment.description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object.
It is impossible to determine its origin.
  • The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I, are revealed for 3 seconds.
Glass_Fragment.name: Glass Fragment

Hair_Bow.description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +30 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).
Hair_Bow.name: Hair Bow

Hair_Brush.description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +20 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).
Hair_Brush.name: Hair Brush

J._Myers_Memorial.description:
A glossy page ripped from the 1965 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
  • Increases the Stalk rate by +25 %.
J._Myers_Memorial.name: J. Myers Memorial

Jewellery.description:
A large necklace made of beads an inexpensive metals.
One of Judith's favourites.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +20 %.
Jewellery.name: Jewellery

Jewellery_Box.description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +30 %.
Jewellery_Box.name: Jewellery Box

Judith's_Journal.description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers.
Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
  • Increases the Stalk rate on the Obsession by +40 %.
Judith's_Journal.name: Judith's Journal

Judith's_Tombstone.description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
  • Grants the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors while in Evil Within III.
  • Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +200 % (+10 Stalk points).
  • Reduces the Movement speed of The Shape by -9 % while in Evil Within III.

"Here lies our beloved daughter."
Judith's_Tombstone.name: Judith's Tombstone

Lock_of_Hair.description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +40 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +100 % (+5 Stalk points).
Lock_of_Hair.name: Lock of Hair

Memorial_Flower.description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
  • Increases the Stalk rate by +11 %.
Memorial_Flower.name: Memorial Flower

Mirror_Shard.description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
  • The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 5 seconds.
Mirror_Shard.name: Mirror Shard

Reflective_Fragment.description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
  • The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 2 seconds.
Reflective_Fragment.name: Reflective Fragment

Scratched_Mirror.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
  • Stalking reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 32 metres of your location.
  • The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within I.
  • Each Hit Score Event grants 200 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category in addition to the regular Bloodpoints gained in the Brutality Category.
Scratched_Mirror.name: Scratched Mirror

Tacky_Earrings.description:
A very cheap piece of jewellery made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +10 %.
Tacky_Earrings.name: Tacky Earrings

Tombstone_Piece.description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
  • Grants the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors while in Evil Within III.
  • Killing a Survivor drains the power of Evil Within III, resetting it to Evil Within II.
  • Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +150 % (+7.5 Stalk points).
Tombstone_Piece.name: Tombstone Piece

Vanity_Mirror.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
  • Stalking reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres of your location.
  • The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within II.
  • Each Hit Score Event grants 150 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category in addition to the regular Bloodpoints gained in the Brutality Category.
Vanity_Mirror.name: Vanity Mirror

Android_Arm.description:
Destroying the other HUX units not only made its extermination of humans easier, it also gave it more parts to work with.
  • Increases the range within which Temporal Slipstream can spread between Survivors by +2 metres.
Android_Arm.name: Android Arm

Broken_Security_Key.description:
Dozens of security measures were applied across the ship's equipment, and many of them were in a state of disrepair.
  • Reduces the Reboot timer of disabled Biopods by -15 %.
Broken_Security_Key.name: Broken Security Key

Cremated_Remains.description:
After extracting the other colonists' DNA, he burned their remains.
  • Survivors afflicted with Temporal Slipstream suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
Cremated_Remains.name: Cremated Remains

Crew_Manifest.description:
A complete list of biographical data on the entire crew of the ship sent to Dvarka.
  • The Auras of Survivors becoming afflicted by Temporal Slipstream from a Biopod or another Survivor are revealed to you for 8 seconds.
  • Increases the range within which Temporal Slipstream can spread between Survivors by +2 metres.
Crew_Manifest.name: Crew Manifest

Cryo_Gel.description:
A no-friction gel applied to crew members before entering deep cryo sleep.
  • Increases the Spreading rate of Temporal Slipstream between Survivors by +25 %.
Cryo_Gel.name: Cryo Gel

Denied_Requisition_Form.description:
Despite the advent of light speed technology, it seemed nothing could make bureaucracy any faster.
  • All Survivors start the Trial afflicted by Temporal Slipstream.
  • Supply Cases take 30 additional seconds to print an EMP at the start of the Trial.
Denied_Requisition_Form.name: Denied Requisition Form

Diagnostic_Tool_(Construction).description:
A device that gives highly accurate information on the lay of the land.
  • The Auras of Survivors picking up an EMP are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
Diagnostic_Tool_(Construction).name: Diagnostic Tool (Construction)

Diagnostic_Tool_(Repair).description:
A device that can find the flaws in constructed objects.
Intended to help with repair.
  • Successful hits during Overclock Mode inflict the Mangled Status Effect until the Survivor is fully healed.
Diagnostic_Tool_(Repair).name: Diagnostic Tool (Repair)

Foreign_Plant_Fibres.description:
Xenobotanists would have a field day with these strange samples of alien plant life.
  • Reduces the duration of the Movement Speed penalty after being hit with a Pallet during Overclock Mode by +20 %.
Foreign_Plant_Fibres.name: Foreign Plant Fibres

Heavy_Water.description:
A by-product of the micro-fission reactors powering cryo and life support.
Even a tiny leak would prove disastrous for onboard sensors.
  • Reduces the Aura-reveal range of Supply Cases by -8 metres.
Heavy_Water.name: Heavy Water

Hologram_Generator.description:
Originally used for communication and entertainment, this has been repurposed for obfuscation.
  • After a successful Slipstream Teleport from a Biopod, the targeted Survivor suffers from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Hologram_Generator.name: Hologram Generator

Hyperawareness_Spray.description:
Used by crew members during long shifts to avoid lapses in focus.
Side effects of overuse include paranoia and, in extreme cases, hallucination.
  • Survivors afflicted with Temporal Slipstream hear the Terror Radius as if The Singularity were nearby.
Hyperawareness_Spray.name: Hyperawareness Spray

Iridescent_Crystal_Shard.description:
A crystal from the alien structure that gave it sentience.
  • Creating a Biopod reveals the Auras of Survivors within 6 metres of that Biopod for 6 seconds.

"HELLO WORLD." — HUX-A7-13
Iridescent_Crystal_Shard.name: Iridescent Crystal Shard

Kid's_Ball_Glove.description:
A kid's baseball glove owned by one of the colonists.
His memories of a youth playing catch were implanted.
  • Extends the duration of Overclock Mode by +15 %.
Kid's_Ball_Glove.name: Kid's Ball Glove

Live_Wires.description:
Unconnected wires attached to a live current that have a tendency to deliver a shocking surprise.
