  • Survivors scream after removing Temporal Slipstream, interrupting their current interaction.
Live_Wires.name: Live Wires

Nanomachine_Gel.description:
A gel that can heal wounds extremely quickly.
However, the machines in it have a history of being hacked to hurt people too.
  • Successful hits during Overclock Mode inflict the Broken Status Effect for 30 seconds.
Nanomachine_Gel.name: Nanomachine Gel

Nutritional_Slurry.description:
Made for the organics, this disgusting concoction works well to nourish any organic matter.
  • Start with 2 additional Biopods.
Nutritional_Slurry.name: Nutritional Slurry

Soma_Family_Photo.description:
A sentimental object that grounds someone to an imagined past.
  • Grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect during Overclock Mode.
  • Reduces the duration of Overclock Mode by -20 %.

"YOUR ATTACHMENT TO ILLUSIONS IS WEAKNESS." — HUX-A7-13
Soma_Family_Photo.name: Soma Family Photo

Spent_Oxygen_Tank.description:
Without air to breathe, organics do not last long.
  • Survivors becoming afflicted with Temporal Slipstream suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 6 seconds.
Spent_Oxygen_Tank.name: Spent Oxygen Tank

Ultrasonic_Sensor.description:
A limitation of organic hearing is a limited aural spectrum.
Expanding that range is like gaining an entirely new sense.
  • Grants the ability to hear sounds through the controlled Biopod after 0.5 seconds.
Ultrasonic_Sensor.name: Ultrasonic Sensor

Adaptive_Lighting.description:
The Drone takes account of the surrounding area and casts lights in a bewildering manner that obscures movement.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +20 %.
Adaptive_Lighting.name: Adaptive Lighting

Adi_Valente_Issue_1.description:
An original copy of the first issue of Adi Valente, the comic her father made while Adriana was a child.
  • Reduces the Success Zone size of Skill Checks for Claw-Trapped Survivors by -20 %.
    • This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.
Adi_Valente_Issue_1.name: Adi Valente Issue 1

Advanced_Movement_Prediction.description:
Even after they leave the zone of influenced, a refined AI programme predicts with high accuracy where a person will go next.
  • The Aura of a Claw-Trapped Survivor is revealed to you for 6 seconds when they receive a Claw Trap.
Advanced_Movement_Prediction.name: Advanced Movement Prediction

Brown_Noise_Generator.description:
An ominous hum disseminates from the Drone, blanketing the soundscape and making it difficult to hear anything else.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
    • This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.
Brown_Noise_Generator.name: Brown Noise Generator

Expired_Batteries.description:
The batteries on these Claw Traps have been swapped out with old alkaline batteries.
Recharging is not recommended.
  • Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect from Tracked Survivors by +25 %.
  • Reduces the Battery life of Claw Traps by -50 %.
Expired_Batteries.name: Expired Batteries

Geographical_Readout.description:
The Drones generate and communicate a detailed three-dimensional map of the terrain, making traversal easier.

After deploying a Drone, you benefit from the following effect for 8 seconds:

  • Increases the Action speeds of breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +20 % each.
Geographical_Readout.name: Geographical Readout

High-Current_Upgrade.description:
A wider cable with low resistance that allows faster recharging of batteries.
  • Increases the Tracking duration of the Radar by +1 second.
High-Current_Upgrade.name: High-Current Upgrade

High-Power_Floodlight.description:
A sudden and overwhelming light that discombobulates anyone foolish enough to approach.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
    • This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.
High-Power_Floodlight.name: High-Power Floodlight

Infrared_Upgrade.description:
Heat-detecting cameras focus in on high-stress individuals with pinpoint accuracy.
  • The Aura of a Claw-Trapped Survivor is revealed to you for 4 seconds when they remove a Claw Trap.
Infrared_Upgrade.name: Infrared Upgrade

Iridescent_Unpublished_Manuscript.description:
Before he disappeared, Adriana's father had started a newer, darker manga: Sonhadores Sombrios.

Whenever a Drone enters the Disabled State, the following effects apply for 15 seconds:

  • The Drone emits a Terror Radius of 32 metres.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect.

"When evil is on the loose, it cannot escape from Adi Valente!" — Quote on the cover of Adi Valente #1
Iridescent_Unpublished_Manuscript.name: Iridescent Unpublished Manuscript

Loose_Screw.description:
A bone-chilling rattling emanates from the Drone, and it seems like it may fall at any moment, distracting Survivors from complicated tasks.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 6 seconds.
Loose_Screw.name: Loose Screw

Low-Power_Mode.description:
By intermittently powering on and off non-vital components, the Drone can stay on for longer.
  • The Scan Lines of Drones no longer rotate.
Low-Power_Mode.name: Low-Power Mode

Powdered_Glass.description:
Once used on the strings used for battle kites, this powdered glass took on a much more nefarious purpose on her blade.
  • Hitting a Claw-Trapped Survivor inflicts the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects until fully healed.
Powdered_Glass.name: Powdered Glass

Prototype_Rotor.description:
The cutting-edge design allows the Drone to move with razor-sharp precision.
  • Increases the Rotational speed of Scan Lines to 110 % of its default speed.
Prototype_Rotor.name: Prototype Rotor

Randomised_Strobes.description:
Lights flash randomly on the ground, making it harder to find purchase on the uneven terrain.
  • Extends the duration of the Hindered Status Effect for Claw-Trapped Survivors when detected by a Drone by +1 second.
Randomised_Strobes.name: Randomised Strobes

Shotgun_Speakers.description:
Capable of directing high-frequency noises in a single direction over great distances, the Drones can focus in on one individual and distract them from danger for some time.
  • Suppresses the Warning sound of Skill Checks for Claw Trapped Survivors.
    • This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.
Shotgun_Speakers.name: Shotgun Speakers

Stereo_Remote_Mic.description:
An upgrade that allows increased three-dimensional audio tracking.
  • Reduces the Disabled State duration of Drones to 85 % of its default duration.
Stereo_Remote_Mic.name: Stereo Remote Mic

Supercharge.description:
The batteries may run a little hot, but removing the safety protocols from the cells makes them last a little longer.
  • Extends the Battery life of Claw Traps by +15 %.
Supercharge.name: Supercharge

Ultrasonic_Speaker.description:
A high-frequency noise blaster that fills the sonic spectrum with disorienting sounds, making it impossible for observers to pick out more important noises.
  • Reduces the Scan Line Immunity duration of Survivors to 75 % of its default duration.
Ultrasonic_Speaker.name: Ultrasonic Speaker

Vital_Targeting_Processor.description:
An additional process in the Drone's programming more accurately predicts the weaknesses of potential prey.
  • Increases the strength of the Hindered Status Effect for Claw-Trapped Survivors when detected by a Drone by -3 %.
Vital_Targeting_Processor.name: Vital Targeting Processor

Dried_Cherry_Blossom.description:
A crumbling, dried cherry flower.
Once the symbol of mortality.
  • Triggers Killer Instinct when coming within 3 metres of a Survivor during a Phase-Walk.
  • Scratch Marks are no longer visible during a Phase-Walk.
Dried_Cherry_Blossom.name: Dried Cherry Blossom

Furin.description:
A warm summer breeze chimes the little bell hanging from the balcony ceiling.
  • Causes all Survivors to hear the Phase-Walk Sound cue.
Furin.name: Furin

Gifted_Bamboo_Comb.description:
A narrow tooth bamboo comb to gently untangle dishevelled hair.
  • Increases the Activation Charge rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +15 %.
Gifted_Bamboo_Comb.name: Gifted Bamboo Comb

Juniper_Bonsai.description:
Dark blue-green foliage bonsai tree.
Once the symbol of Yamaoka family tradition.
  • Reduces the Passive Phasing cool-down by -1 second.
  • Increases the Passive Phasing duration by +50 %.
Juniper_Bonsai.name: Juniper Bonsai

Kaiun_Talisman.description:
A Talisman to get luck on your side.
  • Increases the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by +1 second.
Kaiun_Talisman.name: Kaiun Talisman

Katana_Tsuba.description:
The hand-guard of an ancestral blade.
Crafted for the Yamaoka family.
  • Increases The Spirit's Reappearance duration after a Phase-Walk by +0.2 seconds.
  • Increases The Spirit's Reappearance Movement speed after a Phase-Walk by +5 %.
Katana_Tsuba.name: Katana Tsuba

Kintsugi_Teacup.description:
A cup mended and lacquered with powdered gold.
Both the breakage and repair are part the cup.
  • Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after breaking a Pallet or a Breakable Wall.
Kintsugi_Teacup.name: Kintsugi Teacup

Mother's_Glasses.description:
A pair of glasses belonging to a loving mother afflicted with a chronic disease.
  • Survivors coming within 2 metres of the Husk during a Phase-Walk will trigger Killer Instinct.
Mother's_Glasses.name: Mother's Glasses

Mother-Daughter_Ring.description:
A silver ring engraved with "for my precious daughter".
  • Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by +25 %.
  • Scratch Marks are no longer visible while using Yamaoka's Haunting.
Mother-Daughter_Ring.name: Mother-Daughter Ring

Muddy_Sports_Day_Cap.description:
A muddy sport cap with a High School logo.
Identified with a sewn name tag to "Rin".
  • Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by +10 %.
Muddy_Sports_Day_Cap.name: Muddy Sports Day Cap

Origami_Crane.description:
One of the one thousand Orizuru for your wish to come true.
  • Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +20 %.
Origami_Crane.name: Origami Crane

Rin's_Broken_Watch.description:
A wristwatch with a shattered glass.
The name "Rin" is scribbled on the wristband.
  • Increases the Power Recovery rate by +15 %.
Rin's_Broken_Watch.name: Rin's Broken Watch

Rusty_Flute.description:
A rusty transverse flute with a haunting sound.
  • Increases the Power Recovery rate by +40 %.
Rusty_Flute.name: Rusty Flute

Senko_Hanabi.description:
Thin sparklers that light up summer nights and display the beauty of ephemeral moments in life.
  • Ending a Phase-Walk causes the Husk to explode, blocking any Vault locations within 4 metres of its location for 5 seconds.
Senko_Hanabi.name: Senko Hanabi

Shiawase_Amulet.description:
A Talisman that makes one happy and enthusiastic.
  • Increases the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by +0.5 seconds.
Shiawase_Amulet.name: Shiawase Amulet

Uchiwa.description:
A handheld fan with a koi motif to create a nice breeze on a hot summer day.
  • Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting when stunned by a Pallet.
Uchiwa.name: Uchiwa

Wakizashi_Saya.description:
The scabbard of an ancestral blade.
Once crafted for the Yamaoka family.
  • During a Phase-Walk, press the Active Ability button to immediately return to the Husk.
Wakizashi_Saya.name: Wakizashi Saya

White_Hair_Ribbon.description:
A silken bow to tame wild hair.
  • Increases the Activation Charge rate of the Phase-Walk by +20 %.
White_Hair_Ribbon.name: White Hair Ribbon

Yakuyoke_Amulet.description:
A powerful Talisman to protect your endeavours from being hindered by suspicious circumstances.
  • Increases the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by +3.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by -15 %.
Yakuyoke_Amulet.name: Yakuyoke Amulet

Z\u014dri.description:
A comfortable pair of flat sandals that can easily be slipped on and off.
  • Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by +5 %.
Z\u014dri.name: Zōri

4-Coil_Spring_Kit.description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system to four coil springs, adding a great amount of strength to the Bear Trap's hold.
  • Increases the Bear Trap Disarm time by +33 %.
4-Coil_Spring_Kit.name: 4-Coil Spring Kit

Bear_Oil.description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Trap's squeaky joints.
  • Setting a Bear Trap is silent.
Bear_Oil.name: Bear Oil

Bloody_Coil.description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more dangerous.
  • When a healthy Survivor disarms a Bear Trap, the Bloody Coil exacts its price, putting the Survivor into the Injured State.
Bloody_Coil.name: Bloody Coil

Coffee_Grounds.description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grounds.
  • Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect after setting a Bear Trap by an additional +5 %.
Coffee_Grounds.name: Coffee Grounds

Fastening_Tools.description:
A specialised set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.
  • Increases the Bear Trap Rescue and Escape times by +25 %.
  • Increases the Bear Trap Setting speed by +50 %.
Fastening_Tools.name: Fastening Tools

Honing_Stone.description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the Honing Stone sharpens its blades.
The razor-sharp blades inflict deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.
  • Survivors caught in a Bear Trap, who free themselves, are inflicted with the Dying State.
Honing_Stone.name: Honing Stone

Iridescent_Stone.description:
Bear Traps sharpened with the sickly gleaming Iridescent Stone seem to gain a life of their own.
  • Every 30 seconds, a randomly chosen disarmed Bear Trap is automatically reset and armed.
Iridescent_Stone.name: Iridescent Stone

Lengthened_Jaws.description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Trap.
  • Survivors who escape from Bear Traps suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.
Lengthened_Jaws.name: Lengthened Jaws

Makeshift_Wrap.description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.
  • The Trapper can no longer be caught in his own Bear Traps, they will instead be disarmed when he steps onto them.
Makeshift_Wrap.name: Makeshift Wrap

Oily_Coil.description:
A clear oil that makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more hazardous.
  • When resetting a Bear Trap, the Aura of the Survivor who had disarmed it is revealed for 5 seconds.
Oily_Coil.name: Oily Coil

Padded_Jaws.description:
These Padded Jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound.
  • Bear Traps immobilise Survivors without damaging them.
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for trapping Survivors.
Padded_Jaws.name: Padded Jaws

Rusted_Jaws.description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots, making injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.
Rusted_Jaws.name: Rusted Jaws

Secondary_Coil.description:
A secondary coil keeps the Bear Trap functional in times when the primary coil becomes unusable.
  • Increases the Bear Trap Disarm time by +50 %.
Secondary_Coil.name: Secondary Coil

Serrated_Jaws.description:
These replacement Bear Trap jaws have saw-like blades, causing awful open wounds when they snap.
  • Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.

"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."
Serrated_Jaws.name: Serrated Jaws

Tar_Bottle.description:
A black, matte and sticky substance that when applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.
  • Darkens (α255; R36; G36; B36) the Bear Trap.
Tar_Bottle.name: Tar Bottle

Tension_Spring.description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.
  • Automatically resets the Bear Trap 2 seconds after a Survivor escaped from it.
Tension_Spring.name: Tension Spring

Trapper_Bag.description:
A cured leather waist bag.
Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.
  • Start with 1 additional Bear Trap.
  • Increases the Bear Trap Carrying capacity by 1 Bear Trap.
Trapper_Bag.name: Trapper Bag

Trapper_Gloves.description:
Protective padded leather gloves.
  • Increases the Bear Trap Setting speed by +30 %.
Trapper_Gloves.name: Trapper Gloves

Trapper_Sack.description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.
  • All Bear Traps are carried at the beginning of the Trial instead of spawning throughout the Trial Grounds.
  • The Trapper is unable to pick up Bear Traps once placed.
Trapper_Sack.name: Trapper Sack

Wax_Brick.description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.
  • Increases the Bear Trap Rescue and Escape times by +33 %.
Wax_Brick.name: Wax Brick

Bloody_Boa.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck.
A number of pockets are concealed within it.
  • Start with 8 extra Blades.
  • Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 8.
Bloody_Boa.name: Bloody Boa

Caged_Heart_Shoes.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart.
Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
  • Moderately increases (+0.1 m/s (this value is applied to the start/end parameters of a speed curve)) Throw State Movement speed by +2.5 %.
Caged_Heart_Shoes.name: Caged Heart Shoes

Cut_Thru_U_Single.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks.
Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
  • Blades pierce through Survivors.
  • Subsequent Survivors hit by the same Blade receive 50 % Laceration.

"Can't stop this love
That's tearing your heart
Wherever you go
I will cut you apart" — NO SPIN's "Cut Thru U"
Cut_Thru_U_Single.name: Cut Thru U Single

Death_Throes_Compilation.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record.
Terrifying and emotionally raw.
  • Exiting Main Event replenishes The Trickster's Blades.

"Please, no... don't make it hurt... I can't... I..." — Unidentified Voice
Death_Throes_Compilation.name: Death Throes Compilation

Diamond_Cufflinks.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon.
Rubbing off the blood, there is so much to be seen in the glitter.
  • When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is one Blade Hit away from the maximum, their Aura is revealed for 6 seconds.

"Shhh... you don't have to see your blood anymore." — Ji-Woon Hak
Diamond_Cufflinks.name: Diamond Cufflinks

Edge_of_Revival_Album.description:
The Trickster's debut album.
The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
  • Blades shatter when hitting the environment, dealing 50 % Laceration to nearby Survivors.

"Your whisper on me
Warm as can be
Burning each breath
Till I can't breathe" — The Trickster's "Whispers of Warmth"
Edge_of_Revival_Album.name: Edge of Revival Album

Fizz-Spin_Soda.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN.
High sugar and caffeine content.
  • Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +2 Stacks.
Fizz-Spin_Soda.name: Fizz-Spin Soda

Inferno_Wires.description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members.
Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
  • Increases Main Event duration by +25 %.
Inferno_Wires.name: Inferno Wires

Iridescent_Photocard.description:
A glass-like photo moulded from The Fog itself.
Ji Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
  • When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is two or one Blade Hits away from the maximum, they are inflicted with the Exposed Status Effect.

"It's okay, scream my name. Let me hear everything the pain awakens..." — Ji-Woon Hak
Iridescent_Photocard.name: Iridescent Photocard

Ji-Woon's_Autograph.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster.
Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
  • Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +1 Stack.
Ji-Woon's_Autograph.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph

Killing_Part_Chords.description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for.
Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
  • Slightly increases (+0.04 m/s (this value is applied to the start/end parameters of a speed curve)) Throw State Movement speed by +1 %.
Killing_Part_Chords.name: Killing Part Chords

Lucky_Blade.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned.
Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
  • Increases Main Event duration by +0.3 seconds for each Blade Hit.
Lucky_Blade.name: Lucky Blade

Melodious_Murder.description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up.
Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
  • Reduces Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.
Melodious_Murder.name: Melodious Murder

Memento_Blades.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse.
Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
  • Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Showstopper Score Events.
  • Increases each Survivor's Laceration Meter capacity by +1 Charge.
Memento_Blades.name: Memento Blades

On_Target_Single.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame.
Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
  • Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by +2 seconds.
On_Target_Single.name: On Target Single

Ripper_Brace.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper.
Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
  • Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by 3 seconds.
Ripper_Brace.name: Ripper Brace

Tequila_Moonrock.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar.
Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
  • Increases Main Event duration by +50 %.
Tequila_Moonrock.name: Tequila Moonrock

Trick_Blades.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination.
A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
  • Allows Blades to ricochet off the environment twice.
Trick_Blades.name: Trick Blades

Trick_Pouch.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets.
Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
  • Start with 4 extra Blades.
  • Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 4.
Trick_Pouch.name: Trick Pouch

Waiting_For_You_Watch.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You.
It is a stage prop that does not work and never will.
  • Increases Main Event duration by +0.4 seconds for each Blade Hit.

"Don't run away
Don't say we're through
No way to escape this
I'll be waiting for you" — NO SPIN's "Waiting For You"
Waiting_For_You_Watch.name: Waiting For You Watch

Baby_Teeth.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago.
They are unusually sharp.
  • Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.
Baby_Teeth.name: Baby Teeth

Bloody_Black_Hood.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte.
Soon, he became the prey.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time when switching to Charlotte by -0.5 seconds.
Bloody_Black_Hood.name: Bloody Black Hood

Cat's_Eye.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family.
Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
  • Fully charging and holding a Pounce allows Victor to roam silently.
Cat's_Eye.name: Cat's Eye

Cat_Figurine.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye.
He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
  • Displays the Target location of Victor's Pounce.
Cat_Figurine.name: Cat Figurine

Ceremonial_Candelabrum.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn.
A symbol of his tenacity.
  • Increases the Crushing time of Victor while he is idle by +0.2 seconds.
Ceremonial_Candelabrum.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum

Drop_of_Perfume.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with.
It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
  • While controlling Charlotte, Survivors who are within Victor's Shriek radius suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

"Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men's hearts." — A History of Witches and Demons (1602)
Drop_of_Perfume.name: Drop of Perfume

Forest_Stew.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
  • Increases the Movement speed of Victor by +0.6 m/s.

"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." — Madeleine Deshayes
Forest_Stew.name: Forest Stew

Iridescent_Pendant.description:
A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself.
There is a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
  • If a Survivor crushes Victor while he is idle, they suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 45 seconds.

"Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." — Madeleine Deshayes
Iridescent_Pendant.name: Iridescent Pendant

Madeleine's_Glove.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother.
During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
  • Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +4 metres.
Madeleine's_Glove.name: Madeleine's Glove

Madeleine's_Scarf.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death.
The Twins kept it as a memento.
  • Increases the Movement speed of Victor by +0.3 m/s.

"...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." — Inquiry into the death of Madeleine Deshayes
Madeleine's_Scarf.name: Madeleine's Scarf

Rusted_Needle.description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
  • Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.
Rusted_Needle.name: Rusted Needle

Sewer_Sludge.description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
  • Increases the Removing time of Victor by +2 seconds.
Sewer_Sludge.name: Sewer Sludge

Silencing_Cloth.description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth.
Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
  • After waking from her Dormant State, Charlotte is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.

"I don't like this game anymore, Mother..." — Charlotte Deshayes
Silencing_Cloth.name: Silencing Cloth

Soured_Milk.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured.
Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
  • Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +2 metres.
Soured_Milk.name: Soured Milk

Spinning_Top.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.
He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
  • Pouncing on Survivors causes them to drop any Item they may be carrying.

"Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes
Spinning_Top.name: Spinning Top

Stale_Biscuit.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town's market.
It was not much, but it was better than most meals
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Victor Pounce by -0.4 seconds.
Stale_Biscuit.name: Stale Biscuit

Tiny_Fingernail.description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor's death.
As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
  • Reduces the Unbinding time of Victor by -0.5 seconds.
Tiny_Fingernail.name: Tiny Fingernail

Toy_Sword.description:
A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long.
Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
  • Reduces the Charge time of a Pounce by -0.2 seconds.
Toy_Sword.name: Toy Sword

Victor's_Soldier.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.
Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
  • If a Survivor crushes Victor while he is idle, their Aura is revealed to Charlotte for 6 seconds.

"Kch--kch—k'ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes
Victor's_Soldier.name: Victor's Soldier

Weighty_Rattle.description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.
It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
  • Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 20 seconds.
Weighty_Rattle.name: Weighty Rattle

\"All_Seeing\"_-_Blood.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.

Unlocks hidden potential in The Wraith's Aura-reading ability:

  • When cloaked, the Auras of Survivors are revealed to you within 8 metres of your location.
\"All_Seeing\"_-_Blood.name: "All Seeing" - Blood

\"All_Seeing\"_-_Spirit.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, ominously glows on the head of the Bell.

Unlocks hidden potential in The Wraith's Aura-reading ability:

  • When cloaked, the intensity of the Aura of Generators reveal their Repair progression.
\"All_Seeing\"_-_Spirit.name: "All Seeing" - Spirit

\"Blind_Warrior\"_-_Mud.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
\"Blind_Warrior\"_-_Mud.name: "Blind Warrior" - Mud

\"Blind_Warrior\"_-_White.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Mangled and Haemorrhage Status Effects until fully healed.
\"Blind_Warrior\"_-_White.name: "Blind Warrior" - White

\"Blink\"_-_Mud.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces Cloaking time by -40 %.
\"Blink\"_-_Mud.name: "Blink" - Mud

\"Blink\"_-_White.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces Cloaking time by -60 %.
\"Blink\"_-_White.name: "Blink" - White

\"Shadow_Dance\"_-_Blood.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +60 % while cloaked.
\"Shadow_Dance\"_-_Blood.name: "Shadow Dance" - Blood

\"Shadow_Dance\"_-_White.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +40 % while cloaked.
\"Shadow_Dance\"_-_White.name: "Shadow Dance" - White

\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_Blood.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces Uncloaking time by -12 %.
\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_Blood.name: "Swift Hunt" - Blood

\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_Mud.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces Uncloaking time by -8 %.
\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_Mud.name: "Swift Hunt" - Mud

\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_White.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces Uncloaking time by -10 %.
\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_White.name: "Swift Hunt" - White

\"The_Beast\"_-_Soot.description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the Realm of Fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
  • The Terror Radius of The Wraith is no longer suppressed while cloaked.
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Stalking and Surprise Attack Score Events.
\"The_Beast\"_-_Soot.name: "The Beast" - Soot

\"The_Ghost\"_-_Soot.description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the Spirit World, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
  • Continues to suppress the Terror Radius and the Red Stain of The Wraith for 6 seconds after uncloaking.
\"The_Ghost\"_-_Soot.name: "The Ghost" - Soot

\"The_Hound\"_-_Soot.description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
  • Pools of Blood appear bright red to The Wraith while cloaked.
\"The_Hound\"_-_Soot.name: "The Hound" - Soot

\"The_Serpent\"_-_Soot.description:
The Laokeye symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
  • Breaking Breakable Walls or Pallets by any means, or performing the Damage Generator action on incomplete Generators, will cause The Wraith to automatically uncloak.
\"The_Serpent\"_-_Soot.name: "The Serpent" - Soot

\"Windstorm\"_-_Blood.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +9 %.
\"Windstorm\"_-_Blood.name: "Windstorm" - Blood

\"Windstorm\"_-_Mud.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +5 %.
\"Windstorm\"_-_Mud.name: "Windstorm" - Mud

\"Windstorm\"_-_White.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +7 %.
\"Windstorm\"_-_White.name: "Windstorm" - White

Bone_Clapper.description:
A Bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone.
Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.
  • Survivors are unable to discern distance and direction of the Wailing Bell's tolls.
Bone_Clapper.name: Bone Clapper

Coxcombed_Clapper.description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound.
A malevolent Aura emanates from it.
  • Silences the Wailing Bell tolls.
Coxcombed_Clapper.name: Coxcombed Clapper

Acidic_Blood.description:
When damaged, The Xenomorph's unique physiology made it deadlier than ever.
  • Survivors stunning The Xenomorph within 20 seconds of it exiting the Tunnels, and while it is in Crawler Mode, immediately lose a Health State.
    • Survivors in the Injured State will suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect instead.

"I think we oughta discuss the bonus situation." — Parker
Acidic_Blood.name: Acidic Blood

Ash's_Innards.description:
While hardier, mechanical beings break too when enough force is applied.
  • Increases the Respawn timer of destroyed Turrets by +10 seconds.
Ash's_Innards.name: Ash's Innards

Brett's_Cap.description:
This Nostromo ballcap was fashionable, but severely limited his vertical field of vision.
  • Whenever a Turret is destroyed by any means, all Survivors within 16 metres of it suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 25 seconds.
Brett's_Cap.name: Brett's Cap

Cat_Carrier.description:
Saving the cat is a noble goal.
It's also very distracting.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds when a Turret knocks The Xenomorph out of Crawler Mode.
Cat_Carrier.name: Cat Carrier

Cereal_Rations.description:
Contains 100 % of the recommended daily intake of Vitamin A.
Tastes awful.
  • The Auras of deployed Turrets are revealed to you while inside the Tunnels.
    • This effect lingers for 3 seconds after exiting the Tunnels.
Cereal_Rations.name: Cereal Rations

Crew_Headset.description:
While they facilitated team communication, the constant chatter made the crew easier to track.
  • Increases the Footstep-Detection range when inside the Tunnels by +6 metres.
Crew_Headset.name: Crew Headset

Drinking_Bird.description:
One of the many tchotchkes littering the Nostromo's living quarters.
A bit of whimsy in an otherwise sterile environment.
  • Increases the Killer Instinct duration after exiting the Tunnels by +2 seconds.
Drinking_Bird.name: Drinking Bird

Emergency_Helmet.description:
An extra helmet on the bridge, for use in emergencies only.
  • Increases the resistance to Staggering from Turrets by +35 %.
Emergency_Helmet.name: Emergency Helmet

Harpoon_Gun.description:
Barely a weapon, its use is only viable in a situation of last resort.
  • After successfully hitting a Survivor within 10 seconds of exiting the Tunnels, all other Survivors farther than 24 metres away from you scream and reveal their location.
Harpoon_Gun.name: Harpoon Gun

Improvised_Cattle_Prod.description:
A brutal and noisy weapon, which might have been more effective against a cow.

Each time a Generator is completed, the following effect applies for the next 15 seconds:

  • Reveals the Auras of all Survivors coming within 10 metres of a Control Station for 15 seconds.

"It shouldn't damage the little bastard, unless its skin's thinner than ours." — Brett
Improvised_Cattle_Prod.name: Improvised Cattle Prod

Kane's_Helmet.description:
A thin layer of glass was the difference between a minor inconvenience and the tragic destruction of the Nostromo's crew.
  • Survivors hit with a Tail Attack suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.
Kane's_Helmet.name: Kane's Helmet

Lambert's_Star_Map.description:
Vital for interstellar travel, but not as useful on a smaller scale.
  • Reduces the Flame-throwing distance of Turrets by -2 metres.
Lambert's_Star_Map.name: Lambert's Star Map

Light_Wand.description:
A portable light source used by Ash and Dallas while looking for the invasive creature.
Mostly ineffective for lighting larger spaces.
  • Increases the Downtime duration of Turrets after exiting the Tunnels by +1 second.
Light_Wand.name: Light Wand

Moulted_Skin.description:
The Xenomorph moulted many times as it rapidly grew on the Nostromo.
Its shed skin was a constant reminder of its presence.
  • After deploying a Turret, that Survivor suffers from the Exhausted and Hindered Status Effects for 3 seconds.
Moulted_Skin.name: Moulted Skin

Multipurpose_Hatchet.description:
Equally useful for destruction and repair.
  • Survivors hit with a Tail Attack suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.
Multipurpose_Hatchet.name: Multipurpose Hatchet

Ovomorph.description:
It looks harmless, but the horrors held inside are immeasurable.
  • Increases the Power Recovery speed of Crawler Mode, when outside of Tunnels, by +25 %.
Ovomorph.name: Ovomorph

Parker's_Headband.description:
A bold fashion choice that doubled as a handy way to wick sweat from the eyes.
  • Grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect after exiting the Tunnels for 3 seconds.
Parker's_Headband.name: Parker's Headband

Ripley's_Watch.description:
On a ship as massive as the Nostromo, synchronising watches was important to keep track of work shifts.
  • Causes Turrets to auto-destruct after knocking The Xenomorph out of Crawler Mode.
Ripley's_Watch.name: Ripley's Watch

Self-Destruct_Bolt.description:
They needed to be removed to start, and replaced to end, the self-destruct sequence.
Just seeing them evokes a sense of urgency.
  • Increases the Vaulting speed in Crawler Mode by +30 %.
Self-Destruct_Bolt.name: Self-Destruct Bolt

Semiotic_Keyboard.description:
Its symbols are designed to be universally recognisable, but they may take some getting used to.
  • The Repair Progression of Generators within 16 metres a Turret can be determined by the intensity of their Aura.
Semiotic_Keyboard.name: Semiotic Keyboard
